Reclamele care fac de ru\u0219ine comer\: The adverts shaming Britain's arms trade
Urm\u0103ri\u021bi filmul realizat de Am: Watch Amnesty International's anti-arms fair video.
\u0218i bastoane electrice care provoac\: And electric stun batons that cause excruciating pain but leave no trace!
Vocea vesel\u0103 \u0219i imaginile anim: The cheery voice and cartoon imagery leave no doubt that this advert for the world's biggest arms fair is a sharp spoof, produced for Amnesty International to highlight the British government's willingness to flog weapons to repressive regimes via the Defence and Security Equipment International's jamboree at the ExCeL Centre in London's Docklands.
\u0218tiri similare: T\u00e2rgul de arma: Related: DSEI weapons fair: authoritarian regimes descend on London
\u00cens\u0103 o campanie separat\u0103: But a separate campaign is also leading to many posters cropping up at bus stops and on tube trains that require a second glance.
\u201eAnun\u021b important, c\u0103l\u01: "Important announcement, Travelling on the DLR from 15th to 18th September?" reads one, using London Underground fonts and branding with the DLR line turning into the image of a tank.
\u00cen luna septembrie a acestui an, o: This September, a swarm of arms dealers will be descending on the DLR ... Customers are requested to help stop the arms fair.
Cele 300 de postere sunt realizate de c\: The 300 posters are by artists who exhibited work at the Museum of Cruel Designs in Banksy's Dismaland.
O grupare numit\u0103 Special Patrol Gro: A collective called the Special Patrol Group helped distribute it around London using "Ad Space Hack Packs," a £6 pack of Allen keys which it claims "gain access to around a third of bus stop advertising space on the planet."
Regia de transport din Londra nu este am: Transport for London is not amused by this flyposting "vandalism."
Unul dintre anun\u021burile parodie prod: One of the spoof ads produced by the Special Patrol Group collective.
Conform lui Gavin Grindon, curator Cruel: According to Gavin Grindon, curator of Cruel Designs and a lecturer at the University of Essex, artists are becoming more questioning and seeking to take political work to audiences outside galleries.
Mul\u021bi arti\u0219ti se \u00eendreapt: A lot of artists are moving to work with activists within protest movements, realising they have to get out in the real world for their art to have an impact on society.
Un alt poster \u00eempotriva comer\u021b: Another of the anti-arms trade posters greeting commuters on the tube.
Filmul realizat de Amnesty a avut peste: The Amnesty video has been watched more than 100,000 times in 24 hours via Facebook and was created by ad agency VCCP working pro bono, with the graphic designer and voiceover artist also working for free.
Directorul de crea\u021bie al VCCP,, Mat: VCCP creative director Matt Lever was struck by the silence surrounding the advertising of the arms fair - with a blank space on ExCeL's calendar - and thought: "Let's give them the campaign they are trying to avoid."
S-au jucat cu realizarea unei reclame ma: They toyed with creating a more realistic dodgy corporate advert, but "by ramming it home with bright colours and animation, it was more arresting."
\u201eAu f\u0103cut o treab\u0103 grozav: "They've done a fantastic job in helping us raise concerns about the selling of illegal torture equipment at the fair," says Tom Davies at Amnesty.
Acum, ar fi nevoie ca autorit\u0103\u021: What we need now is for the UK government to take action and ensure that torture equipment is not illegally traded on our doorstep.
Poate cea mai creativ\u0103 form\u0103 d: Perhaps the most creative art surrounding the arms fair comes from inside ExCeL, where exhibitors flog fantastically euphemistic products.
\u00centr-un comunicat de pres\u0103, Sa: In a press release, Saab revealed an order from the US army for "the shoulder-launched AT4CS RS."
Aceasta include \u201eun focos cu form\u: This includes a "unique shaped-charge warhead that delivers outstanding behind-armour-effects inside the target."
Orice ar \u00eensemna asta, nu va fi pl\: Whatever that does, it won't be pleasant.
Opt reguli de aur pentru a tr\u0103i \u0: Eight golden rules for living in student halls
Au trecut 11 ani de c\u00e2nd m-am mutat: It's been 11 years since I moved into student halls as an oblivious 19-year-old, still believing in berets and moral relativism, but it's only now I recall the strained smiles of those I annoyed - and the numerous, lengthy complaints about others.
Majoritatea lucrurilor pe care le-am \u0: Most of what I learned can be distilled into eight simple rules.
Mutarea \u00een c\u0103min poate aduce s: Moving into halls can range from mildly nerve-racking to totally terrifying.
P\u0103l\u0103vr\u0103geala este tentant: It's tempting to babble: telling people where you're from, whether and where you took a gap year, where you stand on Corbyn and why you "honestly neither love nor hate Marmite because seriously guys it's just yeast extract HAHAHA I'll be in my room."
\u0218i ajuta\u021bi-i \u0219i pe al\u02: And help others take one too - ask questions and show interest.
Acestea anim\u0103 conversa\u021bia \u02: It steers the conversation and helps you to scout out the people you like versus those you wouldn't talk to even if your eyelashes were on fire and they were dispensing extinguishers.
Dormitoarele abund\u0103 adesea de petre: People's rooms often morph into drinks receptions, movie-night venues and communal hangout spots, but they're also where people get dressed and adjust their underwear.
Subiecte similare: Nici s\u0103 nu v\u01: Related: Don't even think about starting university in a relationship
Introverti\u021bii au parte de tratament: Introverts get a raw deal at university.
Dormitorul vostru ar trebui s\u0103 fie: Your room should be a retreat, yet many halls form an inter-room-strolling culture that's friendly, social and conducive to lifelong friendships.
Toate acestea pot fi groaznice pentru ci: That can be hell for someone who's trying to recharge.
Nimic din aceast\u0103 cultur\u0103 nu \: Nothing in the culture allows you to say, "I like you and I want our friendship to continue, but I need you to go away so I can get back the energy I've expended on interacting with you."
\u00cencerca\u021bi s\u0103 sesiza\u021b: Try to sense when a fellow student is exhausted from socialising - and maybe text instead of knocking.
Un tip care st\u0103tea \u00een acela\u0: One guy in my student halls had a policy that if a door wasn't locked he was invited in.
Dat fiind c\u0103 \u00eencepe\u021bi uni: Since you're starting uni at the height of Bake-Off mania, knocking on people's doors to introduce yourself with a plate of brownies seems marginally less weird, less 1950s "Welcome to the neighbourhood, I baked you something, now smile as I ask you personal questions."
Bun\u0103t\u0103\u021bile preparate \u00: Offering homemade treats is a great way to make friends.
Colocatarii t\u0103i se vor sim\u021bi o: Your housemates will feel obliged to chat, and may end up associating your face with a tasty surprise.
Evident, trebuie s\u0103 fii un buc\u010: Obviously this is subject to you being a decent baker.
Cocoloa\u0219ele de f\u0103in\u0103, zah: Poorly-fused lumps of flour, sugar and fat are more likely to make people pretend to be asleep when you knock.
Furtul m\u00e2nc\u0103rii este o infrac\: Stealing food is a common crime in student halls.
Evident, dac\u0103 \u0219terpele\u0219ti: Obviously nicking someones chicken is theft, but is taking a drop of milk for your tea stealing?
Double check with the milk owner.
Probabil c\u0103 \u00ee\u021bi va spune: Chances are they'll tell you to help yourself even if they're seething inside.
Dac\u0103 cineva v\u0103 fur\u0103 lucru: If someone steals your stuff, it's annoying and you have my sympathies - but try to deal with it more maturely than my hallmate, who tainted her milk with washing-up liquid to punish those who stole it.
Nu face\u021bi zgomot care nu \u00eei la: You shouldn't make noise that keeps people from sleeping or studying.
Asta nu doar pentru c\u0103 \u021bine de: This isn't just to be a decent human, but because you are the proverbial people in glass houses.
O fat\u0103 de pe palier cu mine \u0219i: A girl on my corridor asked her neighbour if they wouldn't mind turning down the drum and bass because it was 3am and she had an exam in the morning.
Reac\u021bia lor a fost s\u0103 dea muzi: They responded by turning it up.
C\u00e2nd au oprit muzica \u00eentr-un f: When they finally shut up at 5am, she kindly let them sleep for two hours before blasting her own music, locking her door as she left for her three-hour exam.
Nu ar fi romantic dac\u0103 viitorul so\: Wouldn't it be romantic if your future spouse happened to move into the same hall as you?
Dimpotriv\u0103, nu ar fi extrem de ciud: Conversely, wouldn't it be knuckle-bitingly awkward if you mistook a hallmate for your future spouse, hooked up, broke up and had to see them every day and possibly watch them get custody of all your mutual friends?
Desigur, nu te po\u021bi \u00eempotrivi: Of course, the heart wants what it wants - but if a hot hallmate is definitely not your future spouse, try to at least talk some sense into your groin.
\u00cen momentul palpitant \u00een care: In the exhilarating moment you realise someone's left their keys inside their unlocked room, the line between pranking and bullying is finer than it seems.
O fars\u0103 reu\u0219it\u0103 este amuz: A good prank is funny, but takes moments to reverse.
Preda\u021bi o lec\u021bie amuzant\u0103: Teach a valuable and amusing lesson about security by hiding something - but never trash someone's room with toothpaste and shampoo.
\u00cencuia\u021bi u\u0219a \u0219i pune: Lock their door and put their keys in a glass of water, which you then put in the freezer - but don't Blu-Tack their possessions to the ceiling more than twice.
Violonistul David Grimal: \u00cen epoca: David Grimal, the violinist: In Bach's era there were no world tours.
Beethoven, Brahms, Bartok, Enescu erau o: Beethoven, Brahms, Bartok, Enescu were working people, artists, and not commercial representatives.
Violonistul francez David Grimal este un: The French violinist David Grimal is one of the great artists of our time, known not only as a soloist but also as the initiator of an unusual, downright "weird" project, as he himself says, Les Dissonances - an orchestra composed of international soloists and talented musicians, who play a symphonic repertoire without having a conductor, and this makes it a curiosity, to say the least, in the classical music scene.
Les Dissonances a fost anul acesta la Fe: Les Dissonances participated this year with two shows in the Enescu Festival: a performance on Sunday, in which the soloist was David Grimal, founder of the orchestra, and one on Monday, when the cellist Xavier Phillips was in the forefront, the works of Enescu being an indispensable and customary element of the event.
Ambele spectacole, desfasurate pe scena: Both performances on the stage of the Athenaeum, showed the audience a different way of interpreting classical music.
Les Dissonances a aparut pe scena muzica: Les Dissonances appeared on the music scene in 2004, at that time being the only classical musical ensemble with no conductor.
Dirijorul este muzicianul cel mai import: The conductor is the most important musician for the other musicians.
Este adevarat, pe de o parte muzicienii: It is true that musicians need an education to become either soloists or performers in an orchestra - here we are talking about instrumentalists and not composers.
Ei insisi au impresia ca au nevoie de un: They themselves feel they need to have a conductor.
De cealalta parte a scenei, pentru publi: On the other side of the stage, for the public, all the musical fetishism focuses on the conductor.
\u0218i astfel, businessul, industria mu: And so, the business, the music industry, markets itself.
Prin urmare, nu mai vorbim despre muzica: Therefore, we are no longer talking about music.
Deci, daca privim aceasta lume, avem pe: "So if we look at this world, on the one hand we have skilled workers, which is stupid, and on the other hand we have a public that cannot listen, but must look instead, which is again stupid," says David Grimal.
Violonistul povesteste ca aceasta schimb: The violinist says that this change in the way he makes music was the result of the "musical deception" in his solo career.
Eram ca un atlet la nivel inalt care tre: I was like a professional athlete who had to do the same exercise in different orchestras around the world, to earn money and to bring money into the music industry.
\u00cen urma cu 10 ani, cand aveam \u00e: 10 years ago, when I was around 30 years old, I found this thing to be very depressing because it could not find the creativity and human brotherhood in this system.
Deci, nu am mai gasit niciun sens de a c: So, I had no reason to continue on this path.
Astfel am decis sa creez Les Dissonances: This is the moment I decided to create Les Dissonances.
Acest lucru se intampla \u00een 2004, ia: This happens in 2004, and at that time nobody was doing this kind of thing without a conductor: "The music world was very conservative and did not want this kind of projects."
\"Cum iti imaginez sa faci marketing cu: "How do you imagine you could market a group of musicians which has no ego?" asks the artist.
David Grimal recunoaste ca Les Dissonace: David Grimal admits that Les Dissonaces is "a luxury", adding that none of the musicians who are part of the orchestra does not depend on the success of this project to make a living.
\u00cen 10 ani de existenta a ansamblulu: In the 10 years of existence of this group, the absence of a conductor did not prove to be an obstacle for the musical act: "Curiously, the more we play a more complex repertoire, the simpler it seems, because all the musicians are obliged to be present in the work and not just in the role," says Grimal, adding that the show on Sunday "had 74 conductors on stage. "
\u00cen opinia lui Grimal, Festivalul En: In Grimal's opinion, the Enescu Festival is "very brave" just because Les Dissonances were among the guests: "A great festival, featuring the greatest orchestras in the world which perform even 3 times a day, and in the midst of these orchestras you also invited this strange group."
Intr-un templu al traditiei orchestrale,: In a temple of the orchestral tradition, as is the Enescu Festival, there is a the place and interest for something different, which breaks barriers.
Vorbind despre opera lui Enescu, violoni: Speaking about the work of Enescu, the violinist admits he feels the music the famous Romanian composer, so he did not feel the need for a special approach when he introduced some of Enescu's work in his repertoire.
Grimal noteaza ca muzica lui Enescu este: Grimal notes that Enescu's music is very instinctive, but that happens when you talk about George Enescu and Romanian music, "because there is a George Enescu who composed French music."
Grimal militeaza pentru schimbarea felul: Grimal strives to change the way in which the Classical music education is carried out, considering that "being a musician, as this activity is organized today, has a taste of death" and that "the future of music is the music itself."
Nu avem nevoie sa facem turul lumii de 5: We do not need to do a world tour 5 times a year if it does not serve anything.
\u00cen epoca lui Bach nu existau turnee: In Bach's era there were no world tours.
Beethoven, Brahms, Bartok, Enescu erau o: Beethoven, Brahms, Bartok, Enescu were working people, artists, and not commercial representatives.
Pentru mine, organizarea concertelor, fe: For me, organizing concerts, festivals, tours, release albums, they are all are formidable, extraordinary, but as long as they are in the service of music.
Daca nu, suntem intr-un sistem \u00een c: If not, we are part of a system where creativity suffers, no longer has freedom.
Pentru a ilustra acest fenomen, David Gr: To illustrate this phenomenon, David Grimal gave the example of Romanian products before and after EU accession: "In Romania, before entering the EU, your vegetables and meat were good."
Pentru a intra \u00een UE a trebuit sa a: To join the EU you had to adopt health laws which are not good for vegetables and meat.
Productia \u0219i agricultura ajung \u00: Agriculture and production end up in the service of the supermarkets, the same way it's happens in France.
Cu muzica se intampla acelasi lucru, est: The same thing happens with music, it's the same logic.
Les Dissonances face rosii poate nu prea: Les Dissonances makes tomatoes which are not particularly good looking, but you cut them they are veritable tomatoes.
Intr-o lume ideala, ar trebui ca aceasta: In an ideal world, this music should be once again be in focus, and the institutions and industries which manage this system should understand that music does not need to be sold, but needs to be shared, and this may be achieved starting with the educational policy.
\"Daca am considera - asa cum o fac core: "If we were to believe - as do the Koreans, the Chinese, the Japanese - that Western music is one of the most beautiful things of humanity, we would reintroduce its teaching in schools, we would reintroduce the concerts on television and through this education we would no longer need to sell music by-products", said Grimal.
Cu siguranta, sunt lucruri \u00een educa: Certainly, there are things in classical music education which remain very communist. This can be found everywhere, is a very militarized phenomenon.
Depinde de aceasta disciplina daca compa: It depends on the discipline if you compare a musician to a soldier, or if we train a musician to play an instrument, who will be a musician, above all.
Vorbim de o educatie complet diferita, d: We are talking about a completely different education. If we want to train a soldier (this education - red.n.), the training must be conducted in a certain way, if we want to train a musician, we are talking about something else.
Dupa parearea dumneavoastra, ce este mai: In your opinion, who is more dangerous, a soldier or a musician?", asks the French artist smiling.
Grimal arata ca, pentru artisti, recompe: Grimal shows that for artists, to reward a different way of making music comes from overcoming the "soldier" status, overcoming "the limit imposed by oneself": "In a certain moment, musicians discover that they are not soldiers, and therefore leave the concert smiling."
David Grimal a vorbit despre proiectul s: David Grimal spoke about his musical project and his vision for the music and the artist in the "Festival of Ideas", a public discussion organized by the Romanian Aspen Institute during the George Enescu International Festival.
Dupa ce a urmat Conservatoire National S: After attending the Conservatoire National Superieur de Musique in Paris under the direction of Regis Pasquier, during which he received advice and encouragement from famous artists such as Schlomo Mintz and Isaac Stern, David Grimal studied for a year at the Ecole des Science Politiques before meeting with Philippe Hirshhorn in Paris, meeting which changed the course of life.
David Grimal are o cariera international: David Grimal has an international career as a solo violinist. During the last 20 years he held regular concerts on the main classical music stages of the world with prestigious orchestras such as the Orchestre de Paris, Orchestre Philharmonique de Radio France, Russian National Orchestra, Orchestre National de Lyon, Chamber Orchestra of Europe, Berliner Symphoniker, New Japan Philharmonic, Orchestre de l'Opera de Lyon, Salzburg Mozarteum Orchestra, Jerusalem Symphony Orchestra and Sinfonia Varsovia under the direction of conductors such as Christoph Eschenbach, Michel Plasson, Michael Schￃnwandt, Peter Csaba, Heinrich Schiff, Lawrence Foster, Emmanuel Krivine, Mikhail Pletnev, Rafael Fruￌhbeck de Burgos and Peter Eotvos, Andris Nelsons, Christian Arming.
A fost destinatarul unor lucrari cu dedi: Several works have been dedicated to him by several composers, among which Marc-Andre Dalbavie, Brice Pauset, Thierry Escaich, Jean-Francois Zygel, Alexander Gasparov, Victor Kissine, Fuminori Tanada, Richard Dubugnon, Ivan Fedele, Philippe Harrowing, Anders Hillborg, Oscar Bianchi, Guillaume Connesson and Frederic Verrieres.
Pe langa cariera sa de artist solo, Davi: Besides his career as a solo artist, David Grimal wanted to explore more personal projects.
Libertatea pe care i-a oferit-o colabora: The freedom gained by his collaboration with Les Dissonances allowed him to develop his inner world by venturing in repertoires that are not accessible to a solo artist.
Alaturi de Les Dissonances, a infiintat: Together with Les Dissonances, he founded "L'Autre Saison", a series of concerts given for the benefit and together with the homeless at the Saint-Leu church, located in the heart of Paris.
Incepand din 2008, David Grimal a fost A: Since 2008, David Grimal was a resident artist at the Opera of Dijon.
Preda cursuri de vioara la Musikhochschu: He teaches violin at the Musikhochschule of Sarrebruck, Germany.
De asemenea, tine multe cursuri de maies: He also teaches many master classes and was a member of the jury in the Long-Thibaud International Competition in Paris in 2010.
A primit distinctia Chevalier des Arts e: He was awarded the Chevalier des Arts et des Lettres by the French Minister of Culture in 2008.
David Grimal canta pe un Stradivarius, \: David Grimal plays a Stradivarius, "ex Roederer" from 1710, but also the "Don Quixote", a violin designed especially for him by the French violinmaker Jacques Fustier.
David Grimal a fost prezent duminica \u0: David Grimal was introduced Sunday at the George Enescu International Festival of this year together with Les Dissonances Orchestra, the program containing works by Debussy, Enescu and Beethoven.
Les Dissonances a urcat \u0219i luni pe: Les Dissonances also appeared on stage Monday, this time together with cellist Xavier Phillips in the foreground, and the program consisted of works by Schnittke, Brahms and Enescu.
Cinema City lanseaz\u0103 cea mai tare p: Cinema City launches the ultimate challenge for children: dubbing two characters from the blockbuster "Snow Queen 3D"
Ai un copil super-talentat \u0219i spont: Do you have a super-talented and spontaneous child, who likes movies?
Ofer\u0103-i \u0219ansa de a ajunge vede: Give him/her the chance to become a star.
\u00cen luna septembrie, \u00een cadrul: In September, during the latest campaign dedicated to enthusiastic and ambitious children, eager to become the next stars and aged between 8 and 16, Cinema City seeks "Small Big Voices", giving them the extraordinary opportunity to dub two characters from a famous animated film.
Dac\u0103 \u00een desenele clasice se pu: If classic cartoons focused on the semblance of the actor's voice to the animated character's features, lately, when a story is created, the persons who will become the voices of the characters are also taken into consideration, and they are usually well-known actors.
Cinema City Rom\u00e2nia \u00eens\u0103: However, Cinema City Romania wishes to discover new voices and this is why we are launching this unique campaign.
Dorim s\u0103 g\u0103sim vocea potrivit\: We want to find the right voice and we challenge parents to register their children in our contest.
Vor avea parte de o experien\u021b\u0103: They will benefit from a special experience, because the characters are cute and the lines are funny.
\"Copiii se vor distra \u0219i vor avea: "The children will have fun and will get a real chance to be part of a team of actors," said Ioana Ionescu, Marketing Manager of Cinema City Romania.
\u00cen prima etap\u0103 de concurs, \u0: In the first stage of the competition, between 11 September to 30 September, Cinema City is organizing a pre-selection after which 10 children will be chosen (five girls and five boys) who will have the opportunity to audition in a recording studio alongside professionals.
Tot ce trebuie s\u0103 fac\u0103 p\u0103: All parents have to do is access the platform micilevocimari.cinema-city.ro, to register their child in the contest and prepare him/her for the voice audition.
Ulterior, trebuie s\u0103 aleag\u0103 un: Then, they have to choose one of four movies available on the platform, download the texts the child is going to read and then the child will be recorded while giving his/her own version of the dubbing.
Patru filme despre prietenie, eroi de ba: The contestants can choose for the audition four films about friendship, fairy-tale heroes, magic and hope: "Yellowbird 3D," "Mune:The Guardian of the Moon 3D","Blinky Bill: The Movie 3D"and "Maya the Bee 3D".
\u00cen final, cei mai talenta\u021bi do: Finally, the most talented two children (a girl and a boy) will see their dream come true and will dub one character in the blockbuster "The Snow Queen - 3D," which will premiere in Romania in November this year.
C\u00e2\u0219tigurile FedEx sunt mixte,: FedEx earnings mixed, lowers fiscal 2016 outlook
FedEx a declarat rezultate dezam\u0103gi: FedEx reported disappointing results for its latest quarter, and the delivery giant cut its full-year profit forecast on weaker demand for freight services and higher costs in its ground division.
Compania a declarat de asemenea c\u0103: The company also said it plans to hire about 55,000 seasonal workers for the holidays.
\u00cen aceea\u0219i perioad\u0103 a anu: At this time last year, FedEx announced it would hire 50,000 seasonal workers for the holidays.
Ac\u021biunile companiei au sc\u0103zut: Its shares fell about 2.5 percent in premarket trading 45 minutes ahead of Wednesday's opening bell.
FedEx Corp. a declarat c\u0103 se a\u021: FedEx Corp. said that it expects to earn between $10.40 and $10.90 for the fiscal year that ends next May, down 20 cents from an earlier prediction.
Anali\u0219tii preconizau cifra de 10,84: Analysts expected $10.84, according to a survey by FactSet.
Estimarea \u00een sc\u0103dere vine \u00: The reduced outlook comes despite rate hikes averaging 4.9 percent, which will take effect Jan. 4, and higher surcharges for ground shipment of heavy or large packages, which begin in November.
Compania a declarat c\u0103 se a\u0219te: The company said it still expects earnings to grow over the previous year because of cost-cutting, higher revenue and growth in online commerce.
Pre\u0219edintele \u0219i directorul gen: Chairman and CEO Fred Smith said the company was "performing solidly given weaker-than-expected economic conditions, especially in manufacturing and global trade."
Planurile de angajare pe perioada s\u010: The holiday-hiring plans were announced a day after rival UPS said that that it plans to hire 90,000 to 95,000 extra workers, about the same that it hired last year.
\u00cen trimestrul care s-a \u00eencheia: In the quarter that ended Aug. 31, FedEx earned $692 million, up 6 percent from a year earlier.
C\u00e2\u0219tigurile per ac\u021biune a: Earnings per share amounted to $2.42, short of the $2.44 per share average forecast of 12 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research.
\u0218ase anali\u0219ti care au particip: Six analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $12.23 billion.
Compania FedEx a fost lovit\u0103 \u00ee: FedEx has been hit in recent years by a decline in priority international shipping, which has caused revenue in its Express unit to stagnate.
\u00cens\u0103 explozia \u00een cump\u01: But the boom in online shopping has boosted results at FedEx Ground.
\u00cen ultimul trimestru, veniturile di: In the latest quarter, ground revenue rose 29 percent but operating income was basically flat on higher costs for larger packages and self-insurance.
Unitatea express a \u00eenregistrat o cr: The express unit saw higher income because of higher base rates, while income fell in the freight business on higher labor costs.
La tranzac\u021bionarea pre-market, cu a: In premarket trading about an hour before the opening bell, FedEx shares were down $3.85, or 2.5 percent, to $150.15.
Mar\u021bi la \u00eenchidere sc\u0103zus: They closed Tuesday down 11 percent for the year and 17 percent below a record high on June 11.
Cu ocazia celei mai a\u0219teptate \u00e: At their most anticipated meeting in years, Federal Reserve policymakers will spend two days this week seated around a 27-foot Honduran mahogany table deciding if it's time to raise a key interest rate for the first time in nearly a decade.
Deasupra lor, la un cap\u0103t al s\u010: Looming over them at one end of the central bank's ornate, two-story boardroom will be a mural of the United States.
Harta este menit\u0103 s\u0103 reamintea: The map is a reminder that Fed Chairwoman Janet L. Yellen and her colleagues are supposed to put the nation's economic interests above all others.
Banca Central\u0103 a primit o sarcin\u0: The central bank has a dual charge from Congress: maximize U.S. employment and keep prices here stable.
\u00cens\u0103 de la marea criz\u0103 ec: But since the Great Recession, Fed leaders have acknowledged that there's an unwritten third mandate: financial stability.
Iar aceast\u0103 a treia sarcin\u0103 ar: And that third mandate could be the X-factor in a too-close-to-predict decision, to be announced Thursday, about whether the U.S. economy is ready to start being weaned from the unprecedented stimulus provided by the near-zero short-term interest rate in place since late 2008.
Chiar dac\u0103 majoritatea datelor indi: Even though most data show the economy growing solidly, the recent turmoil in global financial markets could make already-cautious Fed officials skittish about adding to the volatility by raising their benchmark federal funds rate - even by no more than a mere quarter of a percentage point.
\u201eEvident, pia\u021ba muncii \u0219i: "Obviously the labor market and inflation is going to be first and foremost the most important thing they watch," said Lindsey M. Piegza, chief economist at brokerage firm Stifel Nicolaus & Co.
\u201eCred \u00eens\u0103 c\u0103 dac\u0: "But I think if they were looking for an excuse not to raise the rate, the increased uncertainty surrounding the global marketplace is enough to provide them with justification to wait further," she said.
Nu exist\u0103 un consens \u00een ceea c: There's no consensus about what the Fed will do, which in itself is causing financial market jitters.
Aproximativ jum\u0103tate dintre economi: About half of economists surveyed recently by Bloomberg predicted a rate increase this week.
\u00cens\u0103 pie\u021bele financiare s: Financial markets, however, are expecting the Fed to hold off, with a key indicator showing only about a 30% chance of a boost.
Aceasta ar indica o sc\u0103dere pe burs: That would point to a stock market drop if the Fed raises the rate, unless policymakers were to soften the blow by promising that another increase would be a ways off.
Mar\u021bi, media industrial\u0103 Dow J: On Tuesday, the Dow Jones industrial average jumped 228.89 points, or 1.4%, to 16,599.85.
Av\u00e2ntul a fost declan\u0219at de a\: The rally was triggered by expectations that Fed policymakers will hold the rate steady this week, said John Lonski, chief economist at Moody's Capital Markets Research Group.
\u201eAr fi surprinz\u0103tor ca Fed s\u: "It would be a surprise if the Fed hiked rates at this point in time," he said.
Dac\u0103 factorii de decizie Fed ar fac: If Fed policymakers did, "they would have to go to great lengths in their policy statement to hold financial markets' hands so they don't panic."
Al\u021bi exper\u021bi au declarat c\u01: Other experts argued that a rate increase would calm financial markets because it would remove uncertainty about when the Fed would act.
Cu doar o lun\u0103 \u00een urm\u0103, F: Just a month ago, the Fed seemed on track to raise the rate by 0.25 percentage point this month, the first small step in a slow tightening of monetary conditions that would validate the strength of the U.S. recovery.
Yellen a declarat \u00een prim\u0103var\: Yellen had said through the spring and early summer that she expected a rate increase this year despite complaints from liberals that more economic progress was needed.
De\u0219i crearea locurilor de munc\u010: Although job creation slowed in August, labor market growth has been solid this year.
Rata \u0219omajului a sc\u0103zut la 5,1: The unemployment rate dropped to 5.1% last month, the lowest in more than seven years and near the level the Fed considers to be full employment.
C\u00e2\u0219tigurile salariale au preze: Wage gains have shown signs of picking up.
\u0218i de\u0219i infla\u021bia a contin: And although inflation continued to run below the central bank's annual 2% target, Fed policymakers said a key reason was the temporary effect of sharply lower oil prices.
Economia \u201epoate face fa\u021b\u0103: The economy "can cope with higher rates, and needs them, given the tightness of the labor market," said Ian Shepherdson, chief economist at Pantheon Macroeconomics.
\u00cens\u0103 pie\u021bele financiare d: But financial markets around the world started convulsing late last month after China devalued its currency.
Media industrial\u0103 Dow Jones a sc\u0: The Dow Jones industrial average dropped as much as 16% below its record high in May as investors feared a slowing Chinese economy would drag down global growth.
Pia\u021ba a reculat oarecum luna aceast: The market has rebounded somewhat this month, with the Dow now down nearly 10% from the May high.
Pentru factorii de decizie Fed, agita\u0: For Fed policymakers, the market turmoil adds to the complex calculus of when to raise the interest rate.
\u201eF\u0103r\u0103 ceea ce s-a \u00een: "Absent what happened in financial markets and the news about the weakness in the Chinese economy over the past couple weeks, they would be tightening at this meeting," said Stephen D. Oliner, a senior research fellow at the UCLA Ziman Center for Real Estate and a former Fed official.
Acum, el preconizeaz\u0103 c\u0103 vor a: Now, he predicts they'll wait at least a month to get a better handle on the effects.
\u201eExist\u0103 foarte mult\u0103 ince: "There's a lot of uncertainty about what the impacts on the U.S. economy are going to be, and they have almost no data to rely on that post-dates the developments in China," Oliner said.
Bun\u0103starea economiei globale nu est: The health of the global economy isn't one of the Fed's primary concerns, so technically it shouldn't be factored into its decision-making.
\u00cens\u0103, \u00een realitate, Fed a: But, in effect, the Fed has become the monetary authority of the world.
\u00cen ultimii ani, influen\u021ba b\u0: The central bank's influence in recent years has been enormous.
Simpla aluzie a pre\u0219edintelui de at: The mere hint by then-Chairman Ben S. Bernanke in 2013 that the Fed might "taper" its monetary expansion triggered market convulsions around the globe.
\u00centr-o lume \u00een care pie\u021be: In a world where markets and economies are increasingly intertwined, Fed officials can be expected not only to monitor the developments elsewhere but also to consult with other central bankers and experts to get a better read on the global economy.
Procesul s\u0103u decizional este \u201e: Its decision-making process is "more art than science," said Zachary Karabell, head of global strategy for wealth-management firm Envestnet Inc.
Jeffrey Lacker, pre\u0219edintele Federa: Jeffrey Lacker, president of the Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond, Va., noted this month that "the Fed has a history of overreacting to financial market movements that seem unconnected to economic fundamentals."
Lacker, membru cu drept de vot al Comisi: Lacker, a voting member of the policymaking Federal Open Market Committee who has been pushing for a rate increase, cited decisions in 1998-99 as an example.
O criz\u0103 financiar\u0103 care a afec: A financial crisis in Asia led the Fed to cut its benchmark rate by 0.75 percentage point over three meetings "despite limited identifiable implications for U.S. growth," Lacker said.
Un an mai t\u00e2rziu, oficialii Fed au: A year later, Fed officials reversed those cuts.
Fed ar trebui s\u0103 pun\u0103 problema: The Fed should put financial stability concerns first only during a major crisis, such as the 2008 market meltdown, said Adam S. Posen, a former member of the Bank of England's rate-setting committee.
Ultima perioad\u0103 agitat\u0103 nu se: The latest turmoil doesn't come close to that level, he said.
\u201eCu siguran\u021b\u0103 c\u0103 nu: "You certainly don't want to be put in a situation of being scared of a rate hike because markets got upset," said Posen, president of the Peterson Institute for International Economics.
Actul Federal Reserve de\u021bine \u00ee: The Federal Reserve Act still has the dual mandate and does not mention financial stability, and until that is changed, I don't think they should get ahead of the curve.
Pia\u021ba/depozitul deschis\u0103/desch: The market/warehouse opened in 1997 and is owned by LAX-C Inc.
Numit\u0103 adesea Thai Costco, LAX-C es: Frequently referred to as the Thai Costco, LAX-C is a wholesale Thai market that also sells to the public.

Produsele au pre\u021buri rezonabile iar: Items are reasonably priced, and a number of items are sold in bulk.

Cine cump\u0103r\u0103 de acolo: Proprie: Who shops there: Restaurant owners and chefs, also single families and individuals.
Pe culoarele largi \u00eencap at\u00e2t: The wide aisles accommodate both shopping carts and forklifts.
Descoperirea: fructe de Durian proaspete: The find: Fresh monthong durian next to the checkout stand.
Unde se afl\u0103: Magazinul se afl\u010: Where is it: The store is in an industrial part of Los Angeles hugging the outskirts of Chinatown and Downtown - a few blocks away from Philippe The Original.
Parcare: LAX-C are propria zon\u0103 de: Parking: LAX-C has its own lot, which it shares with other shops and restaurants.

Seven's Sunrise domin\u0103 sondajele, \: Seven's Sunrise dominates ratings, despite Nine's attempts to cover the leadership spill on Today Show

Today a \u00eenregistrat o u\u0219oar\u0: Today scored a slight uptick compared to its ratings for Monday (317,000) and last Tuesday (283,000) but its figure was behind last Thursday's (343,000).
Today a mic\u0219orat diferen\u021ba fa\: Today has been closing the gap on Sunrise in recent months.
\u00cen august, Today avea o audien\u021: In August, Today averaged 318,000 to Sunrise's 330,000.

Patru persoane, inclusiv un b\u0103ie\u0: Four people, including a 4-year-old boy, were killed in southern Nepal after the police fired rubber bullets into a crowd demonstrating against the country's proposed new constitution, an official said on Wednesday.
Violen\u021bele s-au produs mar\u021bi s: The violence occurred Tuesday evening in the district of Rupandehi, about 175 miles west of Kathmandu, the capital.
Conform declara\u021biilor lui Bishnu Pr: Bishnu Prasad Dhakal, the chief district officer, said more than 1,000 protesters had gathered outside a police station, some of them throwing stones and firebombs.

Dup\u0103 spusele acestuia, au fost r\u0: Twenty police officers and five civilians were wounded, he said.
Nu a fost clar imediat de ce gloan\u021b: It was not immediately clear why rubber bullets, which are known to kill but are traditionally used as a less-lethal alternative, apparently produced such a high death toll.
Ciocnirea a fost ultimul eveniment dup\u: The clash was the latest in weeks of violent protests across Nepal's southern plains, where members of the Madhesi ethnic group say new provinces established under the proposed new constitution would dilute their political influence.
Proteste au existat \u0219i \u00een vest: There have also been protests in western Nepal from ethnic Tharus who want their own state.
Cel pu\u021bin 40 de persoane, inclusiv: At least 40 people, including 11 police officials, have been killed in violent clashes since Aug.
c\u00e2nd patru partide politice importa: 10, when four major political parties signed an agreement to divide the country into provinces - a major step toward a new constitution but a highly contentious issue in Nepal, which has been centrally governed for centuries.

Chirurgia de reducere a greut\u0103\u021: For mildly obese diabetics, weight loss surgery may be helpful
Beneficiile chirurgiei de reducere a gre: The benefits of weight loss surgery for mildly obese people with type 2 diabetes can last at least five years, according to a new study.
Este \u00eenc\u0103 prematur pentru a sp: It's still to early to say whether mildly obese people with diabetes live longer after weight loss surgery than those who receive non-surgical treatments, however.
\u201eEste necesar mult timp pentru a ce: "The mortality data take a long time to show up," said Dr. Robin Blackstone, a weight loss surgery expert who wrote an editorial on the new study in JAMA Surgery.
Opera\u021biile pentru pierdere \u00een: Weight loss operations, or bariatric surgery, use various methods to shrink the size of the stomach.
Acestea reduc senza\u021bia de foame \u0: They reduce hunger and limit the body's ability to absorb food.
De-a lungul anilor, chirurgia bariatric\: Over the years, bariatric surgeries have proved effective for treating type 2 diabetes, but most studies were done in people who are morbidly obese, with a body mass index (BMI) of 35 or above.
IMC, o unitate de m\u0103sur\u0103 a gre: BMI, a measure of weight in relation to height, is considered normal between 18.5 and 24.9.
Valoarea IMC de cel pu\u021bin 25 indic\: A BMI of 25 or higher indicates that someone is overweight, and people with a BMI over 30 are considered obese.
V\u0103 pute\u021bi calcula IMC-ul acces: You can calculate your BMI here: 1.usa.gov/1D0ZqDv.
Pentru noul studiu, cercet\u0103torii de: For the new study, researchers from Taiwan's Min-Sheng General Hospital used data collected since 2007 in a trial comparing two kinds of bariatric surgery - gastric bypass and sleeve gastrectomy - to medical treatments for type 2 diabetes in people who were mildly obese.
IMC mediu la persoanele care au suferit: The average BMI among those who had surgery fell from 31 to 24.5 by the end of their fifth year in the study.
\u00centre timp, IMC la persoanele care: Meanwhile, the BMI among those receiving non-surgical diabetes treatments stayed about the same at 29.
Dintre cei care au suferit interven\u021: Among those who had surgery, diabetes resolved completely in 36 percent and partially in 28 percent.
\u00cen grupul tratat prin metode medica: In the medically-treated group, by comparison, diabetes resolved completely in only 1 percent and partially in only about 2 percent.
\u00cen plus, controlul tensiunii arteri: In addition, control of blood pressure, triglycerides, and "bad" LDL cholesterol "was generally better in the surgical group," the authors found.
Cercet\u0103torii au monitorizat de asem: The researchers also monitored patients' blood levels of hemoglobin A1c, which reflect blood sugar levels over time.
Cercet\u0103torii scriu c\u0103 nivelul: Hemoglobin A1c is best kept below 7 percent, the researchers write.
Dup\u0103 interven\u021bia chirurgical\u: After surgery, the average hemoglobin A1c level fell from about 9 percent to about 6 percent.
\u00cens\u0103 \u00een grupul tratat pri: In the medical therapy group, however, it remained steady at about 8 percent.
\u00cens\u0103 acest \u201econtrol glice: But this better "glycemic control" - as reflected by the improved hemoglobin A1c levels - did not reduce the mortality rate at five years, according to lead researcher Dr. Chih-Cheng Hsu and colleagues.
Echipa de cercetare a comparat de asemen: The research team also compared average outcomes with the two types of surgery.
\u00cen al cincilea an, comparativ cu gr: At the fifth year, compared to the sleeve gastrectomy group, the bypass surgery group had lost more weight (18.7 vs 14.2 kg), achieved larger drops in BMI (7.4 vs 5.1) and in hemoglobin A1c (3.1 percent vs 2.1 percent) and were more likely to have complete diabetes remission (46.9 percent vs 16.7 percent).
De\u0219i noul studiu nu indic\u0103 un: While the new study does not show a survival benefit or surgery after five years, there is evidence from a study of heavier people in Sweden that surgery does lead to a longer life, says Blackstone, of the University of Arizona College of Medicine-Phoenix.
\u00cen studiul suedez, persoanele obeze: In the Swedish study, obese people who had bariatric surgery were about 29 percent less likely to die over 15 years, compared to a group who tried more conventional methods.
De\u0219i noul studiu nu a indicat un be: Though the new study didn't show a benefit in survival among surgery patients, Blackstone said it's reassuring for people with a BMI under 35 interested in the procedure.
\u201eAcesta este punctul \u00een care a: "This is where this paper is critical, because it says this surgery is safe in that lower BMI group," with no increased risk of death or renal disease, she said.
Blackstone a ad\u0103ugat c\u0103 pacien: Blackstone added that people and their doctors should start taking weight seriously once the patient's BMI falls between 27 and 30.
\u201eCred c\u0103 a\u0219tept\u0103m pr: "I think we wait too long to get people to be serious about this," she said.
Cred c\u0103 odat\u0103 ce au acumulat a: I think that once they've accumulated these genetic changes that hardwired their bodies into obesity and diabetes, reversing that is really hard.

Conform Centrului anti-otr\u0103vire din: Poison control centers around the United States have reported a nearly 400-percent uptick since 2010 in the number of children under the age of 12 swallowing highly-alcoholic hand sanitizer, according to the Georgia Poison Center.
Conform Dr. Gaylord Lopez, directorul Ce: According to Dr. Gaylord Lopez, director of the Georgia Poison Center, hand sanitizer ingestion cases in children under 12 that were reported to poison control centers went up from 3,266 in 2010 to 16,117 in 2014.
\u201eCopiii au acces mai frecvent la ac: "Kids are getting into these products more frequently, and unfortunately, there's a percentage of them going to the emergency room," Lopez told CNN.
Lopez a declarat c\u0103 unii copii beau: He said some kids are drinking sanitizer intentionally, while some do it to impress their friends or on a social-media dare.
Pe YouTube pot fi urm\u0103rite filme ca: Videos on YouTube show teenagers drinking sanitizer for a cheap buzz.
Se pare c\u0103 adolescen\u021bii au ame: Teens have reportedly mixed sanitizer with alcohol-containing mouthwash for a stiffer drink.

\u201eUn copil nu se g\u00e2nde\u0219te: "A kid is not thinking this is bad for them," Lopez said.
Multe dintre cele mai atractive tipuri (: A lot of the more attractive (hand sanitizers) are the ones that are scented.
Detergen\u021bii de m\u00e2ini cu arom\u: There are strawberry, grape, orange-flavored hand sanitizers that are very appealing to kids.
Detergentul de m\u00e2ini con\u021bine a: Hand sanitizer contains anywhere between 45 and 95 percent alcohol.
Mai ales la copiii mici, doar c\u00e2tev: In young children, especially, only a few squirts can cause alcohol poisoning.
\u201eEste alcool foarte concentrat\u201: "It's highly concentrated alcohol," Dr. Stephen Thornton, medical director of the poison control center at University of Kansas Hospital, told Fox 4 in Kansas City.
Astfel, evit\u0103m s\u0103 l\u0103s\u01: So you wouldn't leave a shot of whiskey sitting around, but people will have these hand sanitizers out and if kids get into it, it's a quick way to consume a lot of alcohol.
Nhaijah Russell, o feti\u021b\u0103 \u00: Nhaijah Russell, a six-year-old girl who recently ingested as many as four squirts of strawberry-scented hand sanitizer at school, was taken to an emergency room for treatment.
Avea alcoolemia179, de dou\u0103 ori mai: Her blood-alcohol level was .179, twice the threshold considered legally drunk in an adult, according to Dr. Chris Ritchey, an emergency room doctor who treated her at Gwinnett Medical Center outside of Atlanta.
Nhaijah b\u0103lm\u0103jea \u0219i nu pu: Nhaijah was slurring her words and was unable to walk when she arrived at the emergency room.
Medicii au monitorizat-o peste noapte \u: Doctors monitored her overnight at a separate children's hospital for any signs of brain trauma, as the alcohol caused the girl to fall and hit her head, Ritchey said.
\u201eA fost \u00eensp\u0103im\u00e2nt\u: "That was very scary," Ortoria Scott, Nhaijah's mother, told CNN.
It could have been very lethal for my child.
Lopez le-a recomandat p\u0103rin\u021bil: Lopez has recommended parents and teachers use nonalcoholic products or sanitizing wipes short of moving hand sanitizer out of a child's reach.
Pe l\u00e2ng\u0103 otr\u0103virea cu alc: Beyond alcohol poisoning, some sanitizers have been linked to deaths.
\u00cen 2013, dou\u0103 femei din Ontari: In 2013, two Ontario women died after swallowing hand sanitizer that contained a toxic, undeclared ingredient.
Autorit\u0103\u021bile sanitare au presu: Health officials surmised that the product contained methanol, a deadly agent, rather than ethyl alcohol, which was listed as the active ingredient.
\u00cen ianuarie, trei elevi de clasa a: In January, three fourth-grade students in upstate New York plotted to poison their "mean" teacher "by putting antibacterial products around the classroom," according to a police report.

\u00cen cursul zilei de azi, except\u00e: Later today, barring a late legal intervention, I will watch a man being put to death.

Antrenorul Melbourne Storm, Craig Bellam: Melbourne Storm coach Craig Bellamy hits back at rivals over wrestling claims
Melbourne Storm coach Craig Bellamy has called criticism of his side's tackling as "agenda setting" by the NRL's two premiership favourites.

\u0218i-a argumentat p\u0103rerea compar: He made a point of comparing his game on Saturday night with our one on Friday night and how exciting their game was," Bellamy said.

FriendsFest: serialul de comedie care ne: FriendsFest: the comedy show that taught us serious lessons about male friendship
Absen\u021ba personajelor similare \u00e: The absence of similar portrayals in shows is glaring, particularly given how the need for men to open up is more desperate now than ever, with suicide rates amongst young males at 15 year high.
\u00cen 2013, suicidul a reprezentat pri: In 2013, it was the single biggest cause of death in men aged 20-45 in the UK, and remains three times more common in males than females.
\u00cen \u00eencercarea de a aborda prob: In a bid to address the problem, the Campaign Against Living Miserably (CALM) announced 2015 as the Year of the Male, aiming to challenge the culture that prevents men from seeking help when they need it.
Prietenia st\u0103 \u00een centrul lupte: Friendship lies at the heart of the battle to meet this challenge.
Un studiu recent derulat pe mai mult de: A recent study of more than 2,000 high-school students displaying depressive symptoms found that if the sufferer had a high enough percentage of "healthy mood" friends, their chances of recovering doubled.
\u00cen aceea\u0219i m\u0103sur\u0103, p: Equally, for those not depressed, a circle of mentally healthy friends halved the chances of mental challenges arising.
Desigur, pentru ca prietenia s\u0103 aib: But of course, for friendship to work, it needs to be accessible in the first place.
\u00cen aceast\u0103 er\u0103 a comunic\: In this age of social-media led communication, with its focus on style over substance, immediacy of response is often prioritised over meaningful contact.
Vie\u021bile noastre digitale au dublat: Our digital lives have doubled the need to appear strong, fun-loving and successful, even if in reality isolation is king.
Acest succes superficial este dominat de: This superficial success is dominated by what psychologists term extrinsic values; money, image, social status, all at the expense of intrinsic values - our inner yearning for personal growth and friendship - that more deeply impacts our mental health.
Inventatorul miliardar aul unui joc vide: And as a billionaire video-game creator explained recently, money really doesn't buy greater happiness.
Frumuse\u021bea serialului Friends a fos: The beauty of Friends was that it turned this focus on its head.
Personajele nu erau definite de locul de: Each of the characters were not defined by their work, but rather their personalities, which shone through the interaction as friends.
Umorul \u00eembr\u0103\u021bi\u0219\u010: The humour of Joey and Chandler's frequent hugs, moments watching football on the comfy chairs, and Ross's pining for Rachel, came from the knowledge that yes, men can all relate to this, even if they often hold back from fully exploring their feelings.
A\u0219a cum mi-a explicat un lucr\u0103: As a Samaritan worker explained to me: ...."my listening role to people feeling depressed and suicidal has really highlighted how even the smallest interactions from friends can make a difference."
Adesea, persoanele care apeleaz\u0103 la: Often the men who contact us feel unable to speak to friends.
Vechea zical\u0103 s\u0103 te descurci s: The old adage of "getting on with it" is strong, as is the sense that it will be perceived as weak to open up about problems."
Friends este unul dintre serialele care: Friends is one of the shows that comes to mind when I try and offer more long-term coping mechanisms.
Serialul a scos \u00een eviden\u021b\u01: It highlighted the little moments of male friendship.
Oric\u00e2t de mult ajut\u0103 interven\: As much as my objective, outsider status over the phone helps people in moments of desperation, the long-term support comes from a close, personal family and friend network.
Astfel, dac\u0103 participa\u021bi la ac: And so, if you attend Comedy Central's FriendsFest this weekend, with the sets fully redesigned in celebration, why not take your friends for a drink at Central Perk.
Sau, \u0219i mai bine, dac\u0103 vede\u0: Or, better still, if in Starbucks you see someone alone, give a smile and say hello.
Nu se \u0219tie niciodat\u0103 ce difere: You never know what difference your friendship could make.
Friends este difuzat de Comedy Central d: Friends is broadcasting on Comedy Central from start to finish - the full 236 episodes - for #FriendsFest
Di Maria marcheaz\u0103 \u0219i ajut\u01: Di Maria scores to help PSG swat aside Malmo
Angel Di Maria s\u0103rb\u0103tore\u0219: Angel Di Maria celebrates with Blaise Matuidi and Edinson Cavani after scoring against Malmo.
Angel Di Maria a marcat mar\u021bi \u00e: Angel Di Maria scored on his Champions League debut to help PSG ease past Swedish side Malmo on Tuesday.
\u00cen continuare v\u0103 prezent\u0103: Here's the match report and reaction to the game.
Angel Di Maria \u0219i Edinson Cavani \u: Angel Di Maria and Edinson Cavani were on target as Paris Saint-Germain began their Champions League campaign with an ultimately comfortable 2-0 win against Malmo at the Parc des Princes on Tuesday.
Di Maria a marcat \u00een mai pu\u021bin: Di Maria scored less than four minutes into his Champions League debut as a PSG player to set the French champions on their way, but they missed a succession of opportunities before finally extending their advantage when Cavani headed home in the 61st minute.
Ajung\u00e2nd \u00een Grupa A al\u0103tu: With Real Madrid and Shakhtar Donetsk also in Group A, Paris needed a strong start against the Swedish champions as they target not just qualification for the knockout rounds but an improvement on their runs to the quarter-finals in each of the last three campaigns.
\u00cens\u0103, de\u0219i au luat puncte: But while they got the points, it was not a vintage display by Laurent Blanc's side with Zlatan Ibrahimovic wasteful in front of goal and later being substituted against his hometown team and the club with whom he started his illustrious career back in 1999.
\u201eNu este u\u0219or s\u0103 c\u00e2\: "It's not easy to win at home or away in the Champions League, so to win 2-0, cause our opponents problems and look comfortable at the back is a good start even if there are certain things we will need to perfect as the season goes on," said Blanc.
Ne-am dorit s\u0103 c\u00e2\u0219tig\u01: We wanted to win and we did, although I regret that we did not score one or two goals more.
Ibrahimovic a revenit dup\u0103 accident: Ibrahimovic returned after injury in one of three changes to the Paris team that had been held to a 2-2 draw at home by Bordeaux in Ligue 1 at the weekend, but he was upstaged in the fourth minute by Di Maria.
Luna trecut\u0103 c\u00e2nd a fost trans: The Argentina winger was labelled as the man to take PSG to the next level in Europe when he was signed from Manchester United last month, and he indicated why as he ran onto Marco Verratti's pass in behind the Malmo defence before angling a beautiful finish past Johan Wiland and into the far corner of the net.
\u00cens\u0103 dac\u0103 se a\u0219tepta: However, if anyone then expected PSG to romp to a big victory, they were to be disappointed.
Malmo, care a \u00eenvins Celtic \u00een: Malmo, who beat Celtic in a play-off to reach this stage, lined up with nine full internationals on the field at kick-off and, with a five-man defence and two deep in midfield, were stuffy opponents.
\u00cens\u0103 atacul lor nu a fost impr: But, save for a Nikola Djurdjic shot that slid just wide of Kevin Trapp's far post in the 34th minute, they offered little in attack.
\u00cen schimb, juc\u0103torii PSG au \u: Instead, PSG let themselves down at times with some wasteful passing and poor finishing, not least from Ibrahimovic, who failed to convert no fewer than five attempts in the first half alone and was then let down by his touch having been put in by Cavani just after the restart.
Ibrahimovic s-a dovedit \u00eens\u0103 m: Nevertheless, he proved much more adept when it came to setting up his colleagues, and it was from an Ibrahimovic pass that Di Maria sent in a curling shot which was tipped around the post by Wiland on 52 minutes.
Al doilea gol a fost \u00eenscris \u00ee: The second goal finally arrived just after the hour mark thanks to Cavani, the Uruguayan heading home his sixth of the season after Ibrahimovic had flicked on a left-wing cross from Maxwell.
Acest gol a eliminat speran\u021ba celor: That ended any ideas that Malmo had of coming back into the game, and only a superb stop by Wiland from point-blank range to deny David Luiz kept the final score down before substitute Ezequiel Lavezzi had a goal disallowed right at the death.
Antrenorul norvegian al echipei din Malm: Malmo coach Age Hareide later admitted PSG were a class above his side, the Norwegian saying: "Our last Champions League game was in December last year."
De atunci, am jucat doar \u00een liga di: Since then we have only played in the Swedish league which is not the same level.
It was a magnificent match from them.

Guvernul a aprobat, miercuri, \"Strategi: The government approved on Wednesday the "National Strategy on Migration for 2015-2018" and the "Action Plan for the current year", documents regarded as "another step taken by Romania within its efforts to modernise the immigration management process on national territory", according to a press release.

Unde suntem \u00een criza refugiatilor d: What is our position in the refugee crisis after this JHA council which actually solved nothing?
Este clar ca presedintele CE \u00een aco: It is clear that the EC President in agreement with Donald Tusk did not want to force a vote within the council.
Toate pronosticurile spuneau ca ar fi av: All the forecasts say they had the necessary votes.
Inainte de Tratatul de la Lisabona, \u00: Before the Lisbon Treaty, the JHA applied the principle of unanimity and any state could block any decision.
De aceea, lucrurile au fost foarte putin: Therefore, very little was integrated in justice and home affairs.
Dupa Lisabona, se aplica procedura norma: After Lisbon, the normal procedure applies, the EC has the initiative, and the Council approves it with the vote of 55% of the countries, namely 16, which represents 65% of the EU population.
The calculations stated that the votes existed.
But they did not want to go forward.
Pentru ca e o chestiune sensibila, au ap: Because it's a sensitive issue, even Germany rejected Chancellor Merkel's policy of openness and did not want other countries to see it as: "EU thrusts migrants upon us".
Au amanat asadar, dar problema ramane pe: The matter was therefore postponed, but the problem remains because obviously this wave creates a huge problem for the Schengen governance and we will likely see big changes in the next period.
Deci cotele obligatorii nu au fost cu ad: Mandatory quotas were not really removed, but was the subject only allowed to further cool down?
Da, pe de alta parte, se vorbeste despre: Yes, on the other hand, tongues are wagging about greater involvement of the Frontex agency in the management of external borders, which means a shift of responsibility from the individual member countries found near Schengen's outer border to the Community agencies.
Granita Greciei cu Turcia este \u0219i g: Greece's border with Turkey is actually Germany's border with Turkey, and this wave of migrants proved to be the limit for the old Schengen system.
Poate se va renunta la principiul Dublin: Maybe the Dublin principle will be dropped because it is not sustainable. This principle states that migrants are the responsibility of the State in which they have entered first.
Daca Grecia capoteaza, nu poti spune la: If Greece overturns, you cannot indefinitely sustain it's Greece's deal.
Tocmai pentru ca problema este comuna, e: Precisely because this is a common problem, is it possible to fix it without a precise mechanism, perhaps even a shared mandatory effort to receive the migrants?
Nimeni nu stie exact cum vor functiona c: No one knows exactly how the mandatory quotas will work, if it comes to this.
Pentru ca ramane o problema: ce faci cu: A question still remains unanswered: what do you do with a man who does not want to come to Romania or Portugal, but instead wants to go to Sweden or Germany?
Eu nu cred ca se vor apuca statele europ: I do not think the European states will rush at the migrants: you will go to country X or country Y.
Probabil ca se va ajunge la niste centre: Perhaps it will come to the creation of some unique filtration centres in Greece or in Turkey where the refuge applications will be processed.
These kind of solutions are being conceived.
But the problem does not have a simple solution.
Sunt tari care au zeci de ani de experie: There are countries that have decades of experience in trying to integrate migrants, there are countries with no experience as is the case of Romania, where the problem of migrants will increase xenophobic trends.
Cert este ca vorbim de milioane de oamen: The fact is that we are talking about millions of people in Turkey, Lebanon, Jordan, living in precarious camps and who are just beginning to head towards Europe.
O estimare spune ca numai 10% au apucat: One estimate says that only 10% have managed to leave because it is hard cross the Mediterranean during winter, but next year we expect an even bigger migration wave.
Pronosticul meu e ca ne vom obisnui cu a: My prediction is that we'll get used to this problem and it will not seem so catastrophic in terms of media coverage.
Vorbeati de tari cu experienta mai mica: You were talking about more or less experienced countries.
Vi se pare ca exista vreun loc unde a re: Does it seem like there are some places that have really managed to integrate large groups coming from a non-European culture?
Ma uit la magrebieni \u00een Franta, la: I see the Maghrebians in France, Turks in Germany, they are also landlocked.
I would not make radical statements.
Sigur ca integrarea lor e mai dificila d: Of course, their integration is more difficult than other waves of migration, but that does not mean they are not integrated at all.
A ramas o parte neintegrata care creeaza: There are still some who remain unintegrated, creating majour social problems in France, Germany, UK.
Dar mijloace pur politiensti nu vor func: But pure policing means will not work.
To create a fortress out of Europe is an illusory concept.
Trebuie umblat la mecanismele de integra: We have to develop the mechanisms of integration in European societies.
Some mistakes have been made in this area.
Sa le cerem acestor oameni sa invete lim: We must ask these people to learn the language, try to appropriate our values, to stop having one foot in Europe and one in their home country, bringing the rest of the family including through marriages of convenience.
Trebuie separata insa problema iminenta: However, we must separate the imminent problem created by these people from the long term problem of their integration.
Daca altii au esuat \u00een integrarea p: If others have failed in long-term integration that doesn't mean that we have to watch them drown in the Mediterranean.
Poate ca avem dubii fata de calitatea va: Maybe we have doubts about the quality of values of these people.
\u0218i daca va fi o interventie \u00een: And if there is going to be an intervention in Syria, which I don't think will ever happen, that does not mean that the country will recover overnight and you can send them back.
Pana sa apara solutii, vedem fortarete \: Until solutions are created, we will see fortresses in Europe.
S-au inchis granite, se ridica ziduri, s: The borders are closed, walls are being risen, border controls are being reintroduced in the Schengen area.
Este proiectul european \u00een pericol?: Is the European project being threatened?
Proiectul european ca atare nu, spatiul: The European project per se is not, but the former organisation form of the Schengen area is.
A fost construit destul de minimal \u021: It was built quite minimalistic and its rules put too much pressure on the countries in which these migrants step foot in for the first time.
Adica noi circulam liber de colo colo, d: I mean we are free to rove, but each with their own problems.
\u00cen fata unui asemenea val nu se poa: We cannot continue like this when we are faced with this migration wave, because some countries cannot handle it.
Cand exista asemenea valuri de emotie, p: When these kind of emotion waves arise, politicians want to show that they are doing something, but in the long run not much is changed.
Dupa atentatele din Franta nu avem o leg: After the attacks in France we do not have a much more draconian anti-terrorist legislation in the EU than we had last year.
E un val al emotiei publice care se inst: It's a wave of public emotion that goes both ways.
\u0218i este atat de instabila de la o s: The emotion is so unstable from one week to another that you cannot base your decisions on it.
Avem multa vorbarie, multe declaratii be: We hear discussions, more bellicose statements from politicians who are at home and feel the pressure of being virile.
\u0218i, apoi, ai cazul dramatic al copi: And then, the dramatic case of the child that drowned in Turkey happens and strikes a chord in the public opinion.
Dupa ce trece emotia publica, ne vom int: After the public emotion passes, we will return to the reasons we have created this space, the freedom of movement that is not only for people but also for goods.
This is the true single European market.
\u0218i nu cred ca europenii vor renunta: And I do not think that the Europeans will give up this principle of freedom of movement.
The fact that there are going to be different rules is a totally different thing.
Schengen e acum ca un animal creat \u00e: Schengen is now like an animal created in another era and which was has not adjusted to the current situation.
Romania cum a jucat pana acum \u00een ac: What was Romania's role in this crisis so far?
Ca o tara mica, care crede ca, daca trag: As a small country, Romania believes that if it covers its eyes and ears, the situation will disappear.
\u00cen fata realitatii valurilor de mig: In the reality of migration waves, you can choose to be part of the solution or say that this is not your problem as a small country.
Noi asta am facut, e o strategie legitim: This was our policy and it's a legitimate strategy, but then you cannot ask to be treated as the seventh country of the EU.
If you are not involved, you cannot be treated as other big countries.
Tarile mari vin cu solutii pentru intrea: Big countries come up with solutions for the entire EU, good or bad, we are not discussing their quality now.
Pe de alta parte, efectul acestei crize: On the other hand, the effect of this crisis is that the Romanians' appetite for Schengen will greatly decrease.
Presedintele Iohannis spune ca e poate b: President Iohannis says that maybe it's a good thing that Romania is not yet part of Schengen.
Deci trecem de la disperarea intrarii la: So we find ourselves in a transition from the despair to join to a more pragmatic position, but the goal still remains.
Exista desigur un risc daca Romania \u02: If Romania and Bulgaria join Schengen, there is of course the risk to be considered as an alternative route by the migrants.
Ceea ce nu inseamna ca e un motiv sa nu: This is not a reason for not joining Schengen, but a reason to be more pragmatic.
Romania va fi parte din Schengen, iar Sc: Romania will be part of Schengen and the Schengen will exist, but it will be transformed in the sense that the external borders will become common responsibility, there will be unique rules of acceptance of the migrants, unique rules of deportation for those who do not receive refuge, unique rules for countries considered safe.
Presedintele ucrainean spunea ca dupa ce: The Ukrainian President stated that after Russia shifted its attention to Syria, there were no more deaths in the Ukraine.
Exista o legatura intre cele doua focare: Is there a link between the two outbreaks, one of Russia's games?
Rusia are un comportament de putere frus: Russia behaves like a frustrated power.
Ea crede ca a fi mare putere inseamna sa: It believes that being a great power means misleading Americans and Europeans.
Din acest punct de vedere, da, exista o: From this point of view, yes, there is a connection.
Fara efortul militar \u0219i financiar a: Without the financial and military effort of the Putin regime, the Assad regime would likely have collapsed long ago.
\u0218i era bine sa se prabuseasca inain: Its crash would have been a good thing if it happened before its main opponent became the Islamic State.
Vreo doi ani a fost o lupta intre regimu: A battle between the Assad regime and the laic and moderate Muslim militias, backed by the Gulf and Western countries, was fought for a couple of years.
Apoi s-a ridicat Statul Islamic \u0219i: Then the Islamic State has risen and we no longer know if we want the Assad regime to fall.
Rusia a putut sa complice lucrurile, dar: Russia could have complicated things, but cannot participate in the solution.

Dar esti mare putere doar daca ai \u0219: You are a great power only if you have solutions.
Jocul la off-side este doar o strategie: The off-side play is just a strategy to save time.
Probabil ca Putin asteapta sa i se faca: Perhaps Putin expects to receive offers, to press buttons in order to resolve the situation.
Ofertele nu vin pentru ca lumea nu e con: The offers do not come because the rest of the world is not convinced that he can solve the issues created by him one way or another.

Ce buton o sa apara \u00een curand: A new button will appear soon
Milioane de utilizatori ai Facebook s-au: Millions of Facebook users have become accustomed to the "Like" button, and the social network's representatives are preparing an opposed one, the "Dislike" button.
Marti, Mark Zuckerberg, co-fondator \u02: Tuesday, Mark Zuckerberg, co-founder and chief executive of the company, announced on his account that this button will be available soon, informs New York Times on its blog.
Zuckerberg a precizat ca butonul de \"Di: Zuckerberg said that the "Dislike" button will look more like a shade of what a user feels than a simple option.
Cu toate acestea, anuntul sau a ridicat: However, the announcement raised the issue that Facebook could become a less friendlier place.
Zuckerberg a mentionat ca vrea sa evite: Zuckerberg said he wants to avoid times when someone posts on his/her account an important event in his/her life, and someone else will hit the "Dislike" button.
Utilizatorii retelei, care a ajuns la 1,: The network's users, which reached 1.5 billion active accounts, have long called for the opportunity to express negative emotions or empathy with something sad.
Mark Zuckerberg a mai spus ca nu este fo: Mark Zuckerberg has said it is not very comfortable for people to give "Like" to current events, such as the refugee crisis, or in the case of a death of a family member.
\"Se poate sa nu te simti confortabil sa: "It may not feel comfortable hitting Like for that post", said the Facebook representative.
Varianta unui nou buton pe Facebook nu a: The variant of a new button on Facebook was not received well by everyone.
\"Exista deja destula ura pe Facebook \u: "There is already enough hate on Facebook and social networks," said Atiq Haneef in Afghanistan, on the Facebook page of the New York Times, where the article on this subject was posted.
Roger Anderson, un microbiolog din Atlan: Roger Anderson, a microbiologist from Atlanta, said that there is nothing wrong with this button, encouraging people to have different views on Facebook.
Debra Aho Williamson, analist social med: Debra Aho Williamson, an eMarketer social media analyst, said it is hard to imagine that one button can transmit a comprehensive range of negative emotions.
Mai mult, sustine ea, se apropie campani: Moreover, she says, the election campaign in America is approaching, and the "Dislike" button would create a total disaster.
Doar 70 de refugiati au intrat \u00een U: Only 70 refugees came to Hungary in 24 hours
Ungaria a acceptat marti doar 70 de migr: Hungary accepted only 70 migrants on Tuesday, a handful out of the thousands that come at its southern border with Serbia, said Government Adviser Gyorgy Bakondi.
Ungaria a declarat stare de urgenta \u00: Hungary declared a state of emergency during the day in two counties along its border with Serbia due to the flow of refugees, closing a key border crossing point and announcing that it would build a fence on the border with Romania, DPA recalls.

\"Dupa cum vedeti, acest lucru este tota: "As you can see, this is totally different," said Serbian Minister for Refugees, Aleksandar Vulin.

Multi evita sa fie inregistrati \u0219i: Many avoid being registered and try to reach the West, especially in Germany.
\"Noul\" sediu al Consiliului Jude\u021b: The "new" headquarters of the County Council is about to collapse.
Investi\u021biile masive f\u0103cute aic: Massive investments made here in recent years to relocate the headquarters of the institution are about to crumble because they were stopped several times.
Doi constructori importan\u021bi care au: Two majour builders who performed the works there became insolvent during work.
Sediul Consiliului Jude\u021bean din str: The County Council headquarters located in Vasile Alecsandri street will eventually crumble by itself.
La un an \u0219i jum\u0103tate de c\u00e: After a year and a half since the consolidation and refunctionalisation works should have been completed, the works are not even half completed.
O ultim\u0103 etap\u0103 \u00een epopeea: A final stage in the building saga developed these passed days when the National Council for Claims Settlement (CNSC) has rejected a complaint from the company which intended to take over the contract for the implementation of the technical project related to the work still to be executed.
Proiectul ini\u021bial a fost \u00eentoc: The initial draft was prepared by Impex Romcatel SA.
Dup\u0103 intrarea \u00een insolven\u021: After the insolvency of the builder and the interruption of work, negotiation procedures were initiated with Impex Romcatel without the publication of a contract notice. The company was going to update the technical design, and then a new tender for works would have been issued.
\"Negocierile nu s-au finalizat \u00eens: "The negotiations did not result in signing of a contract, as the County Council considered that the proposed project would not be profitable for the institution", stated Razvan Timofciuc, the public relations representative of the County Council.
Decizia CJ de \u00eentrerupere a negocie: The County Council's decision to discontinue direct negotiations was sued by Impex Romcatel.
Tribunalul ie\u0219ean a trimis pl\u00e2: The Iasi Court sent the complaint to the CNSC, who dismissed it due to being late.
Aceasta nu \u00eenseamn\u0103 \u00eens\u: This does not mean that the County Council can start searching for another designer.
Impex Romcatel are posibilitatea de a at: Impex Romcatel has the opportunity to appeal against the decision of CNSC. Another designer can be considered only after a final judgement has been issued by the Court of Appeal.
Astfel, lucr\u0103rile de consolidare a: Thus, the consolidation of the building could resume as early as next year.
Inten\u021bia noastr\u0103 este de a re\: Our intention is to resume work as soon as possible.
\u00cen principiu, refacerea proiectului: As a general principle, the redrafting of the technical project should not take long, but we must conclude a contract.
\"A\u0219tept\u0103m s\u0103 vedem dac\u: "We are waiting to see if the decision of CNSC will be appealed or not," said Timofciuc.
Lucr\u0103rile de consolidare a fostului: The consolidation of the former police headquarters began in 2011.
Un prim contract de lucr\u0103ri a fost: The first works contract was terminated in April 2012, after 4.5 million lei had been spent on construction works.
Licita\u021bia a fost reluat\u0103, cont: The tender resumed and the contract was awarded to Moldoconstruct SA.
Firma a intrat \u00eens\u0103 \u00een in: The company became insolvent and this contract was also terminated after payments of 1.5 million lei had been made.
Lucr\u0103rile au fost realizate p\u00e2: The works performed so far represent approximately 50% of the total works.
Ini\u021bial, lucr\u0103rile de consolid: Initially, the consolidation, refunctionalisation and attic conversion works of the building have been evaluated at 7.7 million lei.
