Acordul privind recunoa\u0219terea fapte: The Agreement recognising the facts signed by Dumitru Dascălu was recorded yesterday at Iasi Court and the judges agreed to give a resolution in this case on September 29.
Dumitru Daniel Dasc\u0103lu a fost acuza: Dumitru Daniel Dascalu was charged with forgery in repeated form and agreed to do two years in prison with deferment and community work.
\u00cen ceea ce prive\u0219te faptele im: Regarding the alleged acts of Dascalu, the prosecutors said that, as adviser within the Office of Cadastre, together with other colleagues, he "has forged several minutes of acceptance on service contracts priorly concluded by OCPI of Iași county with the directors of SC Gauss SRL, SC Grup Cinci SRL, SC Topo Euro Cad SRL, SC Agenția de Cadastru și Topografie SRL and PFA Lipșa Ștefan attesting the false fact that the contracted services have been performed in full, although they were not carried out and were not submitted to OCPI of Iași county;
Zilele trecute, fosta \u0219ef\u0103 a O: A few days ago, the former head of the Office Narciza Nedelcu, and other former or current OCPI employees were prosecuted in this case, being accused of paying for services charged by the mentioned companies, although the works were never carried out.
\u00cen opinia pre\u0219edintelui FRH, A: According the President of the Romanian Handball Federation, Alexandru Dedu, Romania can only host a majour handball tournament in 2024, and the women's handball national team training for the Olympics qualifications costs a fortune.
Pre\u0219edintele Federa\u021biei Rom\u0: The President of the Romanian Handball Federation, Alexandru Dedu, stated yesterday during a meeting with the press, that there is great pride in the fact that our country has three teams in the Champions League.
\u00cen ceea ce prive\u0219te echipa na\: Regarding the women's national handball team, "the main objective is the qualification for the Olympic Games in Rio, but in order to achieve this goal, the team must pass two gauntlets, firstly the World Championship and secondly the prequalification tournament" added Dedu.
Ne dorim foarte tare s\u0103 ne calific\: We very much want to qualify for the Olympics.
Sunt ni\u0219te cerin\u021be fantastice: There are some fantastic requirements from the technical staff led by Tomas Ryde.
Staf care va fi compus din \u0219apte sa: Staff which will be formed of seven or eight people.
El vrea antrenor secund, medic, doi maso: He wants a deputy coach, a physician, two masseurs, goalkeepers coach, physical coach, head of delegation.
Ne-au cerut pentru ob\u021binerea califi: They asked certain things in order to obtain the qualification, namely materials for physical training of which I have never heard.
Astea toate pentru a ajunge la Jocurile: All this to get to the Olympics and I will do all I can to obtain them.
Vorbim de o investi\u021bie masiv\u0103,: We're talking about a massive investment, about a lot of money.
Dar \u0103sta este drumul pentru a face: But this is the way to excellence.
Pentru c\u0103 \u00een momentul de fa\u0: Because at this time, our training is like in the Stone Age.
\"Echipele cu care noi ne batem au acest: "The teams we compete with have these materials and they have had them for some time," said Dedu, who also mentioned that he is trying to obtain the amounts needed to purchase these products from the Ministry of Youth and Sport and the Sport and Olympics Romanian Committee.
Pre\u0219edintele FRH s-a referit \u0219: The president of the Romanian Handball Federation also referred to the Romanian infrastructure and the opportunity for our country to host a majour handball competition.
We do not have a gym in Bucharest.
Este o problem\u0103 de infrastructur\u0: It is a matter of infrastructure and it is shameful to think about a European Gymnastics Championship.
S\u0103 nu uit\u0103m c\u0103 \u00een al: Let us not forget that in other parts of the world Olympic districts were built from scratch within two years.
\u00cenainte de 1992, \u00een actuala zo: Until 1992, the current Barcelona Olympic area was a landfill, and now it has become a landmark of beauty.
La fel s-a \u00eent\u00e2mplat \u0219i l: The same happened in London, where the organization of the Olympics in 2012 was a success in terms of investments.
\"\u00cen viziunea mea, \u00een 2024 put: "In my opinion, we can host a majour competition in 2024," concluded Dedu.
El a ad\u0103ugat c\u0103 organismele in: He added that the international handball bodies are willing to give Romania the chance to organize a majour competition.
Pentru mine e o prioritate s\u0103 aduce: For me it's a priority to bring majour handball competitions in Romania.
Domnul Ga\u021bu s-a dus civilizat cu un: Mr. Gatu went with a project in a civilized manner and many have agreed in principle with it but they soon learned that the hall will never be built.
\u0218i eu am avut discu\u021bii cu EHF,: I have also had discussions with the EHF, I told them that we are willing, that we are able to organize such a competition and they said that they agree and that we should invite them to the first match in the new Bucharest hall so we can discuss in concrete terms afterwards.
\"Deci avem toat\u0103 deschiderea, \u02: "So EHF and IHF are both open to the idea, but we have no infrastructure" the RHF official explained.
Fostul mare handbalist a evitat s\u0103: The great former handball player avoided to evaluate the chances of the women's teams CSM Bucuresti and HCM Baia Mare to reach the Final Four: "I have asked all coaches to be reserved in making forecasts, because if they do not happen, it will prejudice them."
Drum bun spre Cupa Mondial\u0103: A safe journey to the World Cup
Rugbi\u0219tii rom\u00e2ni debuteaz\u010: Romanian Rugby players have their debut on September 23 against France
C\u0103pitanul echipei na\u021bionale de: The national rugby team's captain, Mihai Macovei said, on Tuesday, during a press conference, that all the members of the Romanian team are prepared for the matches of the World Cup in England, where he hopes to obtain two victories: "We are ready".
At\u00e2t eu c\u00e2t \u0219i colegii me: Both my colleagues and I have our engines at full speed.
Ne-am antrenat s\u0103 d\u0103m randamen: We have trained to give our best during the four matches.
Toat\u0103 lumea va avea a\u0219tept\u01: Everyone will have high expectations, because our goal is to win two matches against Canada and Italy.
Toate grupele sunt grele \u0219i a noast: All groups are tough, and so is ours.
S\u0103 o lu\u0103m u\u0219or, prima dat: Let's take it easy, firstly with France and then we'll see.
Cu siguran\u021b\u0103 \u00eens\u0103, d: But certainly, if we win with Canada, the match with Italy will be our final.
Nu pot s\u0103 descriu \u00een cuvinte b: Words cannot describe the joy of participating in the World Cup. It is the reward for so many years of work.
Eu \u00eemi doresc s\u0103 nu dezam\u010: I do not want to disappoint anyone from the rugby family and I wish we return home with good results.
\"Vrem s\u0103 fi\u021bi m\u00e2ndri c\u: "We want you to be proud that a few players, a small family as rugby is in Romania, represents with pride the Romanian flag," said Macovei.
Selec\u021bionerul echipei na\u021bional: The coach of the national team of Romania, Lynn Howells, who is at his first experience as a coach at the World Cup, hopes to make the Romanians proud of the national rugby team: "It is a great honour for us to participate in this World Cup."
Sunt sigur c\u0103 juc\u0103torii sunt p: I'm sure the players are ready to participate in the tournament.
Pentru mine e o experien\u021b\u0103 ext: For me, it's a great experience.
Pentru mine este foarte important ca la: For me it is very important to make the Romanians proud of the national team during each match.
Pre\u0219edintele Federa\u021biei Rom\u0: The Romanian Rugby Federation President, Haralambie Dumitraș has faith that the Romanian players can prove the progress they have made in recent years in rugby.
Avem o grup\u0103 foarte dificil\u0103 \: We have a very difficult group and we want to confirm the progress made by the national team.
Le doresc succes sportivilor \u0219i am: I wish the players good luck and I believe will do our best at the event.
\"Ace\u0219ti b\u0103ie\u021bi au \u00ee: "These boys have started playing in the Romanian teams at the age of 18-19, so there is cohesion, it is a group of friends who wants to achieve a dream," said Dumitraș.
La Cupa Mondial\u0103 de rugby din Angli: At the Rugby World Cup in England, Romania will play in Group D, in the following matches: with France, on September 23 in London; with Ireland on September 27 in London; with Canada, on October 6 at Leicester; with Italy, on October 11 at Exeter.
Competi\u021bia \u00eencepe vineri, pe s: The competition starts on Friday, on Twickenham Stadium in London, with the England - Fiji match in Group A.
Noi cursuri de cultur\u0103 japonez\u010: New Japanese culture courses organized at "Al.I.Cuza" University.
Despre aranjamentul florilor \u00eentr-o: You can learn about the arrangement of flowers in a vase, painting in ink, and a casual study of the fine arts specific to the County of the Rising Sun during the courses organized by the students of Iasi county.
Cercul Studen\u021bilor de Cultur\u0103: The Students' Circle of Japanese Culture in Iasi organizes new courses of Japanese culture (ikebana, Sumie and fine arts) during October 2015 - June 2016, for both beginners and advanced learners.
Acestea vor avea loc la Centrul de Studi: The courses will take place at the Centre for European Studies of "Al. I. Cuza" University of Iasi and promote the traditional and modern Japanese arts and culture.
Pentru acestea exist\u0103 o singur\u010: There is only one entry fee of 50 lei per month per person.
\u00cen afar\u0103 de lec\u021biile de a: In addition to art lessons, participants will take part in the development of exhibitions and other cultural activities to promote beauty.
Cursurile de cultur\u0103 japonez\u0103: The Japanese culture courses that we have proposed have been designed as an invitation to the general public, to make the first steps on the road to self-discovery through art.
\"Persoanele interesate vor putea s\u010: "Those interested will find out how to make harmonious sculptural floral creations (ikebana), how to capture the soul of the surrounding elements in plastic compositions using the Japanese ink painting art (Sumie) or how to express their own individuality and creativity through the multifaceted universe of Fine Arts (graphic, drawing, painting)" said Sorin Mazilu, the teacher of these courses.
Cursurile se adreseaz\u0103 tuturor celo: The courses are for all those who are passionate about art, regardless of age or experience.
\u00censcrierile au loc p\u00e2n\u0103 p: You can register until September 30. For more information you can use the telephone number: 0742027153 or the following e-mail address: studenticultura@gmail.com.
14 milioane lei da\u021bi Spitalului \"S: 14 million lei given to "Sf. Spiridon" Hospital at the budget adjustment
Ce se va achizi\u021biona cu aceast\u010: What will this amount of money be used for?
Spitalul \"Sf. Spiridon\" a primit de la: "Sf. Spiridon" Hospital received from the Ministry of Health, following the budget adjustment, about 14 million lei.
Banii pe care unitatea medical\u0103 i-a: The money received by the medical unit to be used until the end of the year will be invested in modernization and planning works of some clinics, but also for equipment and medical technology for which the hospital has already initiated the procurement procedure.
Astfel, unitatea sanitar\u0103 va fi dot: The health unit will thus be equipped with a new Tomography Computer, a new X-ray device, six surgery kits, six ICU beds properly equipped, an ophthalmologic microscope and other equipment necessary to conduct the medical activity.
Pe de alt\u0103 parte, 5 milioane de lei: On the other hand, 5 million lei of the money received by the hospital will be directed to the construction and planning of "Marele Ars" (The Great Burnt).
Din banii de la rectificarea bugetar\u01: From the money coming from the budget adjustment, the ER will receive 500,000 lei for the completion of the modernization works in the main section.
\"\u00cen plus, zilele urm\u0103toare vo: "In addition, in the coming days we will accept the works from the bridge linking the ER to the cardiology, hepatology and gastroenterology clinics to ensure the proper transfer of patients from the ER to the neighbouring clinics" explained the manager of the medical unit.
Spitalul va avea \u00een cur\u00e2nd \u0: The Hospital will soon have the Tătărași Dermatology Clinic in its premises, which will be managed in ambulatory, in the form as it currently operates.
Clinica va func\u021biona \u00een zona \: The clinic will operate in the area where the ambulatory allergy, haematology and endocrinology sections are and will have around 30 beds.
Ia\u0219ul, f\u0103cut de r\u00e2s de co: Iasi, embarrassed by the Autonomous Administration of Public Transport controllers and a leaflet.
O familie de turi\u0219ti din Cluj a ven: A family of tourists from Cluj came to visit Iasi, but the trip ended with a bitter promise.
Dupa experienta traita nici eu nici soti: After this experience, my wife and I never want to set foot in your city.
F\u0103r\u0103 s\u0103 vrea, s-au lovit: Unwillingly, they faced false information from leaflets, the rudeness of the controllers of the Autonomous Administration of Public Transport (RATP) and a fine as a bonus "because the law says so."
So\u021bii au ajuns \u00een Ia\u0219i \u: The couple arrived in Iasi a few days ago, they checked into a hotel and asked for tourist leaflets.
Au primit \u0219i un pliant \u00een care: They also received a leaflet with the RATP routes.
\"\u00cenarma\u021bi\" cu aceste h\u0103: "Armed" with these maps, the spouses visited Iasi.
Dar, \u00een urm\u0103 cu dou\u0103 zile: But two days ago, while they were in Copou, they wanted to go to Palas Mall.
Deoarece nu era tonet\u0103 cu bilete \u: Since there was not a ticket booth in the station near Copou park, they relied on the information printed on the leaflet: they can buy a ticket by SMS.
Nu le-a spus nimeni c\u0103 acest servic: No one told them that this service no longer exists.
\u00cencrez\u0103tori \u00een pliant, ei: Confident in the leaflet, they boarded the bus and tried to send a SMS following the instructions on the leaflet.
Din nefericire pentru ei, \u0219i-a f\u0: Unfortunately for them, a RATP control team showed up.
Au zis ca nu mai exista serviciul de 2 a: They said the service no longer exists for 2 years and that the press announced it has been cancelled.
EU DE UNDE SA STIU ce s-a scris \u00een: HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO KNOW what was written in the local press, since I came to visit the city a night ago?
Am vorbit cu controlorii, le-am explicat: I spoke with the controllers, we explained the situation and they said they do not care, it's not their job.
Au zis ca tot ce pot face e sa ne deie o: They said all they can do is give us just one fine instead of two (for my wife and myself).
\"Am platit, nu am vrut sa imi stric ziu: "I paid, I did not want to ruin my site seeing day at the gendarmerie giving statements!" says Ovidiu.
\u00cen concluzie, familia a fost amenda: In conclusion, the family was fined due to the erroneous information from the leaflet and the controllers "who applied the law to the letter."
Nu este corect, \u0219i am facut o sesiz: This is not right, and I made a referral to RATP Iasi to recover my money.
NU e vorba de bani, nu sunt exagerat de: It's not about the money, the amount was not that great, but the fact is that I felt cheated on.
Bad luck for the rapists of Vaslui.
Au avut accident \u0219i au r\u0103mas \: They had an accident and remained in custody
Procesul celor \u0219apte violatori de l: The trial of the seven rapists from Vaslui was transferred, yesterday, to the Court of Appeal Iași.
Magistra\u021bii ie\u0219eni au judecat: The Magistrates of Iasi county settled the first hearing in a closed session in which the seven youths were accused of raping a young woman aged 18, requested to be set free.
\u00cenainte de \u00eenceperea propriu-z: Before starting the actual hearing, one of the judges from Iasi county who had been assigned the case, Viorel Munteanu, made a request for abstention, which was accepted by his colleagues.
Magistratul a activat p\u00e2n\u0103 \u0: The magistrate worked until this summer at Vaslui Court, where he was the president of the Criminal Section, and he is the one who, on April 9 admitted an appeal brought by four of the defendants, ordering their placement under house arrest.
\u00cen prezent, dosarul este judecat de: Currently, the case is judged by a panel that includes the magistrates Maricica Mititelu and Geta Sandu.
Anterior, \u00een dosar a formulat o ab\: Judge Dan Anton also made a request for abstention earlier in the case, because his daughter is in a relationship of cohabitation with one of the rapists' lawyers .
Cei doi judec\u0103tori au decis ca viol: The two judges decided that the rapists from Vaslui should remain in custody.
Ti\u00adnerii vor r\u0103m\u00e2ne \u00e: The young men will remain imprisoned for at least 30 days, period after which the judges will re-discuss the possibility of setting them free.
Urm\u0103\u00adtorul termen de judecat\u: The next hearing will be held at the Court of Appeal of Iasi county on October 6.
\u00cenainte de a ajunge la Curtea de Ap: Before arriving at the Court of Appeal of Iasi, the van transporting the rapists from Vaslui was involved in an accident in Păcurari district as the car was entering Iasi city through the beltway.
Autoutilitara Iveco cu care erau transpo: The Iveco van that transported the seven rapists was hit by a Volkswagen that came from Canta Street whose driver tried to turn left.
Duba circula dinspre cap\u0103t P\u0103c: The van was coming from the end of Păcurari.
Ma\u0219ina a intrat \u00een Ia\u0219i p: The car came this way because the Prison Administration employees preferred the route from Vaslui to Iasi which passed the location of Grajduri and then they entered on the beltway.
Ei au scurtat astfel drumul cu c\u00e2\u: In this way, the road was shortened by a few kilometres.
Imediat dup\u0103 impact, escorta aresta: Immediately after the impact, the prisoners' escort called for another transport to take the prisoners.
\u00cen scurt timp, la locul accidentulu: Soon, at the accident scene, arrived a car sent from the Iasi Maximum Security Penitentiary, which took the seven prisoners and transported them to the Court of Appeal.
\u00cen urma accidentului, niciunul dint: Following the accident, none of the prisoners was injured.
Pentru a-i transfera \u00een cealalt\u01: To transfer them into the other van, the guards surrounded the back of the cars and the prisoners came out fast by twos.
\"Incidentul nu a fost raportat Poli\u02: "The incident was not reported to the Police because the drivers of the two cars have amicably agreed on the damages to be paid," stated Chief Commissioner Mădălin Țăranu of the County Police Inspectorate.
Rom\u00e2nia nu este \u0219i nici nu va: Romania is not nor will it be ever be ready for what comes next.
O spun de la \u00eenceput, clar \u0219i: I'm going to say this from the beginning, loud and clear: the approximate 7,000 refugees who should be and have to be naturalised by Romania is in itself an insignificant number, but a huge one compared to the capacity of the Romanian state to manage this kind of project .
Pentru Rom\u00e2nia, chiar \u0219i cota: For Romania, even the voluntary quota proposed by Bucharest, amounting to about 1,500 souls, surpasses by far our good intentions of solidarity with the European Union expressed in recent months.
Cu siguran\u021b\u0103, dac\u0103 acei m: Certainly, if those migrants will accept to settle in our cities, the chances of a quick integration in the Romanian society are extraordinarily small.
Sunt convins c\u0103 ei vor fi primii ca: I am convinced that they will be the first to lose their patience.
Parazitat de interlopi \u0219i paralizat: Sucked dry by the parasites of the underworld gangs and by a venal political class, the Romanian State proves to be impotent in all areas.
Neputin\u021ba de a-i integra pe \u021bi: Failure to integrate the Gypsies is just a trivial example.
Pe l\u00e2ng\u0103 asta, guvernele de or: Besides, governments of any colour were not able to absorb European funds to build roads, kindergartens or modern schools, provide decent health care, collect the garbage of the streets, create decently paid jobs or prevent its young generation from leaving the country.
De ce s-ar stabili refugia\u021bii \u00e: Why would a refugee settle in a country similar to the one he's running away from?
Dar ceea ce produce mult\u0103 mirare es: But what is particularly surprising is the hypocrisy displayed when dealing with such a crisis.
Ne lovim \u00eent\u00e2i de f\u0103\u021: Firstly, we come into contact with the hypocrisy of the bellicose powerful countries of the EU, which are especially generous when it comes to sharing their troubles with smaller countries.
Vine apoi ipocrizia fricoas\u0103 a rom\: The second thing is the Romanians' hypocritical fear. Although Romanians have millions of relatives scattered all over the world, they still do not accept the person next to them - the one speaking a different language, having a different religion or just because he has different blood running through his veins.
Probabil de team\u0103 s\u0103 nu-i fure: We are probably afraid that someone will steal our national identity.
La urm\u0103, exist\u0103 \u0219i o ipoc: In the end, there is the hypocrisy of many migrants who, although only invoke the horrors of war as a reason for leaving, do not accept another destination of their exodus other than Germany or the Nordic countries.
Or, nu to\u021bi refugia\u021bii sunt si: However, not all refugees are Syrian, and Pakistan is not at war.
De asemenea, modul simplist \u00een care: Furthermore, the simple way of analysing the crisis can only be derided.
Trebuie eliminate cauzele, sus\u021bin u: Some argue that the causes must be eliminated strictly relying on political correctness, asking for peace and investments in the migrants' home countries.
Dar \u00een Rom\u00e2nia e pace \u0219i: But Romania is at peace and occasionally, some foreign capital is injected in the national economy - but that does not prevent tens of thousands of Romanians from leaving the country every year.
\u00cen aceast\u0103 criz\u0103, Uniunea: In this crisis, the European Union has revealed to be a stiff, divided and overwhelmed structure.
Depl\u00e2ngeam faptul c\u0103 Rom\u00e2: We express criticism about the fact that Romania is not able to invent a project for the country, but we see that the EU also doesn't have any plans for the future.
Iar improviza\u021biile \u0219i amenin\u: Improvisations and threats will not help.
Atunci, la ce mai folose\u0219te UE, dac: Considering the above, what is the use of the EU, if the only advantage enjoyed by the Romanians - freedom of movement - could be called into question because of the waves of refugees crossing borders with no effort whatsoever?
La un moment dat, r\u0103zboiul din Siri: At one point, the war in Syria will end.
\u00cen urm\u0103toarele decenii, suprap: In the following decades, overpopulation, poverty, climate change, resource depletion, etc. will push millions of desperate migrants from Asia and especially Africa to a better life.
Cu asemenea politicieni, Rom\u00e2nia nu: With such politicians, Romania is not nor will it be ever be ready for what comes next.
7.000 de euro pe an pentru a \u00eenchir: 7,000 Euro per year to rent Pogor Club.
Licita\u021bia pentru concesionare vizea: The tender for concession covers 10 years.
Dup\u0103 7 ani \u00een care a r\u0103ma: After 7 years in which it remained closed, the club from the Romanian Literature Museum's courtyard is offered by the County Council to be leased for a period of 10 years.
Construc\u021bia are o suprafa\u021b\u01: The building has a net area of 134 square meters on two levels of cellars.
CJ accept\u0103 ca destina\u021bii date: The County Council accepts as destinations for the building only literary cafe, bookstore or other cultural activities.
Cl\u0103direa a fost evaluat\u0103 la 68: The building was valued at 68,300 euros, and the auction value beings at 6.830 euros per year, with a bidding step of 25 euros.
Concesionarul va trebuie s\u0103 exploat: The concessionaire will have to use the building continuously and consistently and cover all the costs of rehabilitation, according to the technical project to be drafted.
\"Cl\u0103direa Club Pogor este \u00een: "Pogor Club Building is highly deteriorated because during the time in which the catering unit functioned in this spaces or thereafter current repairs and maintenance works were not carried out as required during the operation of a building", is stated in the tendering procedure documentation.
Ofertele de concesionare a clubului sunt: The concession offers for the club can be submitted by September 18.
Doi fr\u0103\u021biori din Tome\u0219ti: Two brothers from Tomești swallowed sleeping pills.
Au fost du\u0219i la spital: They were rushed to the hospital
Doi copii de 9 ani, respectiv 11 ani din: Two small brothers aged 9 and 11 from Tomești, swallowed several Diazepam pills.
Ei au g\u0103sit pastilele \u00een cas\u: They found the pills lying around and took them out of curiosity.
Mama lor urma un tratament, iar medicame: Their mother had been taking medication and the drugs were not hidden.
Copiii au fost du\u0219i de urgen\u021b\: The children were rushed to "Sfanta Maria" hospital in Iași.
Ei sunt \u00een stare stabil\u0103, dup\: Their condition is stable, state the doctors.
EXCLUSIV: O \u00eent\u00e2lnire care \u0: EXCLUSIVE: A meeting that will break your heart.
La 20 de ani a primit un dar curajos: p\: At the age 20 she received a brave gift: her biological parents
Pierdut\u0103 \u00een spital \u00een con: Lost in the hospital under unclear circumstances in the mist of the 90s, when she was only two months old, tiny ill and helpless, she was adopted by a wealthy family form Italy. During this time, the adoption laws in Romania were loosely regulated. The young girl from Iași who is now a beautiful blonde girl, was reunited with their biological parents in a village of the county after nearly two decades in which neither her or her biological parents new nothing about one another.
Crina va \u00eemplini zilele acestea 20: Crina will turn 20 a few days from now, and her adoptive parents in Palermo thought to offer their beloved daughter a courageous and staggering gift: a visit to Romania, to Iași, to learn about her unclear past.
\"Ziarul de Ia\u0219i\", care a asistat: "Ziarul de Iasi" assisted in the efforts to find a family based on a few extremely vague clues, witnessed these meetings which basically broke our hearts.
Relatarea reporterilor, emo\u021biile mo: The story of the reporters, the emotions, the statements of those involved and their reactions are downright poignant and overwhelming.
Povestea Crinei \u00eencepe acum 20 ani: Crina's story begins 20 years ago in the town of Ruginoasa of Iași county, when she was only two months old.
Atunci, din cauza unei probleme de s\u01: Due to health problems, the girl had to be hospitalized in the city.
Acas\u0103 au \u00eenceput s\u0103 exist: At home, disagreements between the parents started to arise and the mother had to leave the residence.
El a hot\u0103r\u00e2t s\u0103 p\u0103st: The father decided to keep the girl and to drive me away from home.
A oprit fata, \u0219i de atunci n-am mai: He kept the girl, and after that I lost all contact.
\"C\u00e2nd am aflat eu c\u0103 era \u00: "When I found out that she was in the hospital, it was too late," recalls Alina grieving, the biological mother of the girl.
Crina a fost internat\u0103 \u00eempreun: Crina and her grandmother were admitted to the hospital of the municipality of Pașcani, and on the same day her father, Costica Balcan went to work in the city of Alexandria, Teleorman County.
Vie\u021bile lor aveau s\u0103 se despar: Their lives would forever part ways.
N-au mai g\u0103sit-o pe Crina la spital: They did not find Crina at the hospital.
Dup\u0103 internare, tat\u0103l Crinei a: After admission, Crina's father went to work in another town and returned after six months.
\u00centre timp, fata a fost transferat\: Meanwhile, the girl was transferred to the hospital in Iași and when the father came back he couldn't find her.
Cred c\u0103 trecuser\u0103 aproape nou\: I think almost nine months had passed since the girl was hospitalized.
\"O fi crezut c\u0103 e abandonat\u0103\: "Maybe she thought she was been abandoned", says a niece of the family.
Din cauza problemelor financiare, bunica: Because of financial problems, the grandmother could not go with Crina to Iași and the girl remained in the care of the doctors.
Pentru c\u0103 nimeni nu s-a mai interes: Because during all this time nobody came to ask about the fate of the child, she was taken by the General Directorate of Social Assistance and Child Protection in Iași, who then gave her to the Foster Care Centre in Bucium.
Erau ani \u00een care abandonul \u0219i: During that period, abandonment and adoption were more lightly regulated in comparison to today's regulations in Romania.
La Centrul Bucium a fost g\u0103sit\u010: The child was found in the centre in Bucium by an Italian, Salvatore and his wife, a couple from Palermo who wanted to have their own child but could not.
S-au \u00eendr\u0103gostit pe loc de blo: They fell in love with blonde Crina, and after some time she moved to Italy with them.
Micu\u021ba f\u0103cuse deja aproape doi: The little girl had turned almost two when the adoption formalities were completed.
C\u00e2nd am v\u0103zut-o pe Crina, am s: When I saw Crina, I felt she's our girl.
\"De parc\u0103 so\u021bia mea i-ar fi d: "It was like my wife had given birth to her", says Salvadore, the adoptive father, smiling, while his hand caches the girl's frail hand.
\u00cen \u021bar\u0103, p\u0103rin\u021b: At home, Crina's parents, Alina and Costică continued to search separately, wherever they were able to.
Tat\u0103l a \u00eentrebat autorit\u0103: The father questioned the authorities of Ruginoasa, but received no reply about the whereabouts of his child.
Poli\u021bia i-a transmis apoi c\u0103 e: The police then informed him that she may be deceased, but the parents found out what really happened to their daughter in Iași.
C\u00e2nd am c\u0103utat-o aici, mi-au s: When I sought her here, the Court told me that she is in Italy, Palermo.
Iar condi\u021bii s\u0103 o caut nu am m: I couldn't look for her anymore.
Ne-am rugat la Dumnezeu s\u0103 fie bine: We prayed to God to keep her safe.
M-am g\u00e2ndit la ea \u00een to\u021bi: I thought of her all the years, but we did not have the possibility to find her.
\"Este greu\", ne poveste\u0219te cu lac: "It's hard," says the biological mother of Crina with tears in her eyes.
\u00cens\u0103, chiar dac\u0103 anii au: However, even if the years passed, the parents from Ruginoasa were never forgotten.
\u00cen Italia, Salvadore \u0219i so\u02: In Italy, Salvatore and his wife explained to the girl about her origins and that her past links her to Romania.
I was just a little girl when I found out.
Cred c\u0103 aveam cinci sau \u0219ase a: I think I was five or six.
Am reac\u021bionat ca o copil\u0103, era: I reacted just like a child, I was curious.
\"Mi-am dorit s\u0103 \u00eemi cunosc p\: "I wanted to meet my parents from Romania," says Crina delighted.
Iar visul ei urma s\u0103 devin\u0103 re: Her dream was going to come true.
\u00cen luna martie a acestui an, comisa: This March, Chief Commissioner Romică Ichim, the Regional Director of the Centre for Prevention, Assessment and Counselling in Iași, was contacted by an acquaintance in Italy, who explained Salvadore's desire to find Crina's biological family.
Iar c\u0103ut\u0103rile au pornit doar d: The search began with just a name.
Dup\u0103 solicitarea pe care am avut-o: After the request from our partners in Italy, we began taking the first steps.
Primisem doar un nume, Balcan Costic\u01: I only received a name, Balcan Costica, then the name of the town, Ruginoasa.
La scurt timp am avut o activitate cu pr: Shortly after that I conducted a business with the city hall of Ruginoasa, and I had the possibility to ask whether the name I received was familiar to the locals.
Atunci mi-au dat c\u00e2teva indica\u021: Then they gave me some pointers, only to find that the person I was directed to wasn't he person I was looking for.
\"A durat p\u00e2n\u0103 la urm\u0103 ca: "It took about a month to find the girl's biological father," explains Chief Commissioner Romică Ichim.
\u00cen total, mai bine de trei luni le-: In total, the authorities needed more than three months to find Costică and Alina, especially since each of them was domiciled in another locality.
Noi am \u00eenceput demersurile undeva \: We started work somewhere in March and in June-July we completed the identification of the biological parents and concluded the discussions.
\"Atunci am stabilit ca \u00een luna sep: "Then we decided that the first meeting will take place in September", added Romică Ichim.
\u00cen weekendul care a trecut, Alina \: Last weekend, Alina and Costică saw the girl who was lost on the halls of the hospital in Iasi for the first time in 20 years.
Tat\u0103l, emo\u021bionat, abia \u00ee\: The father was excited and barely able to control his tears and his hands were shaking incessantly.
Abia schimba c\u00e2teva vorbe cu cei di: He barely exchanged a few words with the people around him.
Cu o s\u0103pt\u0103m\u00e2n\u0103 \u00e: A week before the meeting he hadn't really been able to sleep.
\"Ca s\u0103 \u00ee\u021bi vezi copilul: "It's something extraordinary to see your baby after so many years", says a niece who came with Costică from Ruginoasa.
\u00cent\u00e2lnirea Crinei cu mama \u02: Meeting between Crina and her biological mother and brother
\u00cen discu\u021biile cu fata lui, car: While talking to his daughter, who is going to study at a top universities in Italy, Costica Balcan said, among other things, that if his daughter ever wanted to return to him in the village, she could come at any time: he can give her some sheep, goats, she can find a man from the village and start a household.
Mama e \u0219i ea emo\u021bionat\u0103,: Her mother is also emotional, cries, and she can hardly believe such a thing could happen to her.
N-am crezut c\u0103 se poate \u00eent\u0: I could not believe something like this could happen.
Am v\u0103zut a\u0219a cazuri la televiz: I've seen such cases only on TV, I kept thinking about her all these years, I hoped, but I never thought it could happen to me.
If she could only forgive me.
Eu sper s\u0103 ne vizit\u0103m \u00een: I hope that we can visit each other in the future.
\"Sper s\u0103 putem p\u0103stra o legat: "I hope we can stay in contact", says Alina with big tears on her cheeks, Crina's mother, while holding a napkin tight in her hand.
\u00cen el \u00ee\u0219i mai ascunde lac: She hides her tears of happiness in that napkin, because soon she will see her daughter after so long.
De partea cealalt\u0103, Crina, care va: On the other side, Crina, whose birthday is in just a few days from now, is turning 20 and she's trying to calm herself just like an emotional child.
Nu \u0219tie la ce s\u0103 se a\u0219tep: She has no idea of what to expect, but has a vague idea about her biological parents.
Crede c\u0103 sunt tineri, dar acum \u00: She thinks they're young, but now before the meeting she tries to gather her thoughts, because she has so much to say, but nothing to reproach.
P\u0103rin\u021bii mei sunt dou\u0103 ma: My parents are two mothers and two fathers.
Dar p\u0103rin\u021bii mei sunt p\u00e2n: But in the end, my parents are the ones who raised me.
Va fi o \u00eent\u00e2lnire frumoas\u010: It will be a nice meeting, a wonderful experience.
\"Sper s\u0103 am o amintire frumoas\u01: "I hope to gain a beautiful memory after meeting them, because now there are so many things to say," confesses Crina.
Prima reuniune de familie \u00een Ia\u02: The first family reunion in Iași
\u00cen Pia\u021ba Unirii, sub cerul \u0: In Piața Unirii, beneath the autumn sky, the family from Ruginoasa joins their destiny with their daughter in Palermo.
Crina are acum 20 de ani, termin\u0103 l: Crina is now 20, she's finishing high school according to the Italian school system, but she has the opportunity to begin a new chapter with Alina and Costel, her biological parents.
Nu \u00eei mai despart grani\u021be sau: There are no more borders or countries separating them, just one barrier: the language.
